name: Mei
title: Adventuring Climatologist

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A mobile Tank who controls and disrupts the battlefield with weather-altering technology
description: A brilliant mind with a sunny disposition, Dr. Mei-Ling Zhou joined Overwatch to help solve the world's growing climate problems. Armed with a host of weather-altering technologies, Mei now fights to protect her friends and secure a future for a troubled world.

trait.name: Cryo-Freeze
trait.description: Become encased in ice for 3 seconds, gaining a rapidly decaying Shield that absorbs up to 1104 damage. While active, this Shield grants Unstoppable and restores up to 35% of Mei's maximum Health.
trait.displayText: Activate to gain Shield and heal

abilities.name: Snow Blind
abilities.description: Throw a snowball that hits all enemies in an area. Enemies hit take 70 damage, are Slowed by 35%, and are Blinded for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Throw a snowball that Slows and Blinds

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Command Snowball to create a blizzard at the target location for 2 seconds. Enemies within the blizzard take 13 damage every 0.25 seconds and are Slowed by 7%, stacking up to 35%. When the blizzard ends, enemies within its area take an additional 75 damage and are Stunned for 1.25 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Freeze enemies in an area

abilities.name: Icing
abilities.description: Slide quickly in the targeted direction. When this effect ends, enemies near Mei are knocked back, take 52 damage, and are Slowed by 80%, rapidly decaying over 1.5 seconds.  Can be canceled during sliding.
abilities.displayText: Slide in a direction and knockback enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Avalanche
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, roll a massive snowball that consumes enemy Heroes in its path. At the end of its path, the snowball crumbles, releasing the consumed Heroes, dealing 220 damage and stunning them for 0.5 seconds per Hero consumed.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Consume Heroes in a massive snowball

heroicAbilities.name: Ice Wall
heroicAbilities.description: Vector Targeting After a 0.75 second delay, create an impassable wall that traps enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. When the wall expires, trapped Heroes are slowed by 75%, decaying over 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Trap enemies inside of a path blocking wall

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Deathwing
title: The Destroyer

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Massive Unstoppable Dragon that can withstand punishment while dishing it out, but is unaffected by allied Abilities.
description: One of the five Dragon Aspects and the leader of the Black Dragonflight, Neltharion the Earth-Warder was once a protector of Azeroth. During the War of the Ancients, he was driven mad by the Old Gods and turned against his former allies. Now known as Deathwing the Destroyer, he has found his way to the Nexus where his limitless rage drives his ultimate goal of widespread destruction and the eventual end of all living things.

trait.name: Aspect of Death
trait.description: Deathwing is fitted with 4 Armor Plates which grant 10 Armor each. Every 25% Health lost causes Deathwing to lose a plate. Plates are only restored when Dragonflight is used, based on the amount of Health Deathwing has when landing.  Deathwing is also a mighty Dragon Aspect who is permanently Unstoppable and deals 100% additional Spell Damage to Heroes, but views his allies with contempt and ignores any of their friendly effects.
trait.displayText: Deathwing is especially powerful, but ignores friendly effects

abilities.name: Molten Flame
abilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, Deathwing breathes a stream of flame, dealing 21 damage every 0.125 seconds. Drains 30 Energy per second.
abilities.displayText: Melt enemies with a stream of molten flame

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, Deathwing flaps his wings, dealing 70 damage to nearby enemies.  World Breaker: Lava Burst Create a lava pool that damages and Slows
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies near Deathwing

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Deathwing lunges in a direction dealing 38 damage to enemies and Slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds. Deathwing bites enemies at the end of the lunge, dealing an additional 72 damage.  World Breaker: Earth Shatter Damage and Stun enemies in two lines
abilities.displayText: Lunge in a direction

abilities.name: Dragonflight
abilities.description: After 3 seconds, fly into the sky, becoming Immune to all effects and gaining 2.5% Health per second. Once cast, this ability cannot be interrupted. Cannot be cast for 4 seconds after taking damage, Basic Attacking or casting an Ability.
abilities.displayText: Take to the sky

heroicAbilities.name: Cataclysm
heroicAbilities.description: After 2 seconds, Deathwing flies in the targeted direction, dealing 90 damage on impact and leaving scorched ground that deals 36 damage a second. Lasts 6 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Deathwing flies over an area, causing devastation in his wake.

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Qhira
title: Realmless Bounty Hunter

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A brutal Melee Assassin who is adept at both beginning and ending fights.
description: A sworn knight and holder of a singularity shard, Qhira's only desire is to seek out others who may have escaped the destruction of her doomed home realm, Iresia. While she searches, she gets by as a bounty hunter – a job she loathes, despite her exceptional skill.

trait.name: Grappling Hook
trait.description: Qhira fires a grappling hook that pulls her to terrain it contacts. If an enemy Hero is hit, they take 35 damage and Qhira launches at them, kicking them for an additional 108 damage.  Can be used while Revolving Sweep is active.
trait.displayText: Qhira launches herself towards terrain or Heroes

abilities.name: Carnage
abilities.description: Unleash your sword in the target direction, continuously dealing 30 damage to enemies caught in its path.
abilities.displayText: Unleash your blade to deal damage in an area in front of you

abilities.name: Blood Rage
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attack and Ability damage cause enemies to bleed for 44 damage over 4 seconds. Stacks 5 times.  Active: Qhira deals 32 damage and heals for 85 Health per enemy Hero affected. Damage and healing is increased by 50% per each additional stack on that Hero.
abilities.displayText: Your Basic Attacks and Abilities cause enemies to take damage over time

abilities.name: Revolving Sweep
abilities.description: Attach your sword on the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 96 damage and Stunning them for 0.25 seconds. Once attached, Qhira becomes Immune to all effects, swinging around the target for 2.75 seconds and dealing 105 damage to enemies between you and the target.  Re-activate to send you to the target's location knocking them away, dealing 108 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Attach to an enemy Hero to rotate around and Stun them

heroicAbilities.name: Unrelenting Strikes
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 44 damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Deal damage and Stun nearby enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Final Strike
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, deal 395 damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Extend sword to deal finishing blow

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Anduin
title: King of Stormwind

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A ranged Healer with the ability to pluck an ally from danger.
description: As a young man, Anduin sought peace as a priest of the Holy Light and an envoy of the Alliance. After his father, Varian, fell to the Burning Legion, Anduin took up the crown as High King of the Alliance. He soon learned that peace must be fought for, even in the Nexus.

trait.name: Leap of Faith
trait.description: Faith instantly pulls an allied Hero to Anduin's location, granting them Unstoppable while they travel.
trait.displayText: Pull an allied Hero to your location

abilities.name: Flash Heal
abilities.description: Cast for 0.75 seconds to heal an allied Hero for 260.
abilities.displayText: Cast a heal on an Ally

abilities.name: Divine Star
abilities.description: Send light that deals 140 damage to enemies and then returns to Anduin, healing allied Heroes for 130 in a wider path. Healing increases by 25% per enemy Hero hit.
abilities.displayText: Send a heavenly bolt that damages and heals

abilities.name: Chastise
abilities.description: Shove a swell of light forward, dealing 155 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Rooting them for 1.25 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Shove light forward that Roots

heroicAbilities.name: Holy Word: Salvation
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Protect and heal allies near Anduin

heroicAbilities.name: Lightbomb
heroicAbilities.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Stun enemies around an ally

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Imperius
title: Archangel of Valor

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: An all-in Bruiser that leads the charge with strong initiation and single target damage.
description: Leader of the Angiris Council and Aspect of Valor, Imperius has valiantly led the armies of the High Heavens to innumerous victories over the demons of the Burning Hells. While his methods are exact and severe, there is no greater defender of righteousness in the entirety of creation.

trait.name: Valorous Brand
trait.description: Each Basic Ability marks enemy Heroes hit for 10 seconds. Basic Attacks consume the target's marks, dealing 20% bonus damage per mark and healing for 75 per mark.
trait.displayText: Basic Abilities mark enemy Heroes, increasing Basic Attack damage and healing

abilities.name: Celestial Charge
abilities.description: Lunge towards a targeted direction and stab, dealing 35 damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Channel to Stun for 1 second and deal 70 additional damage when it fully finishes.
abilities.displayText: Charge forward and Stun enemies

abilities.name: Solarion's Fire
abilities.description: Release a fiery wave that deals 100 damage. Enemies hit by the center take 50% bonus damage and are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage and Slow enemies in a line

abilities.name: Molten Armor
abilities.description: Shroud Imperius in flames for 3 seconds, striking a nearby enemy for 19 damage every 0.25 seconds. Imperius heals for 50% of the damage dealt, increased to 100% against Heroes.
abilities.displayText: Burn nearby enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Angelic Armaments
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 damage to the first enemy hit.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Gain a large Shield, reactivate to damage

heroicAbilities.name: Wrath of the Angiris
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 damage and Stunning them for 1 second.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Ascend with an enemy into the Heavens

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Orphea
title: Heir of Raven Court

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A ranged Assassin who dances around her enemies while using spells to empower her attacks.
description: Rejecting the dark power her father had begun to consort with, Orphea tried to run away from the Raven Lord's influence. But after witnessing King's Crest fall to his machinations, she was convinced she needed to stand and fight. She now vows to protect the innocent--as a Hero of the Nexus.

trait.name: Overflowing Chaos
trait.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability grants 1 Chaos. Chaos can stack up to 3 times.  While Orphea has Chaos, her Basic Attacks against Heroes consume all Chaos, dealing 50% increased damage per stack, and healing for 100% of the damage dealt.
trait.displayText: Basic Abilities against enemy Heroes grant Chaos

abilities.name: Shadow Waltz
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 165 damage to enemies in a line.   Hitting a Hero with Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 2 seconds, refunds 35 Mana, and causes Orphea to dash a short distance upon moving.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in a line and dash after hitting a Hero

abilities.name: Chomp
abilities.description: After 0.625 seconds, deal 305 damage to nearby enemies in front of Orphea.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in front of Orphea

abilities.name: Dread
abilities.description: Release a wave of dread that deals 85 damage to enemies hit.  Dread erupts 0.75 seconds after reaching the end of its path, dealing 175 damage. Enemies hit by Dread's wave or eruption are Slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in a line, erupting after a short delay

heroicAbilities.name: Eternal Feast
heroicAbilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage enemies in an area repeatedly

heroicAbilities.name: Crushing Jaws
heroicAbilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Pull, damage, and Stun enemies in an area

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Mal'Ganis
title: Nathrezim Lord

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A self-sustaining Tank that peels for allies and disrupts enemies.
description: Cunning and intelligent, Mal'Ganis was chosen to bring Arthas Menethil into the Lich King’s service. After manipulating the prince into purging Stratholme of life, he finally fell to Frostmourne as Arthas's first act as the Lich King's champion... yet a demon does not die so easily.

trait.name: Vampiric Touch
trait.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 45% of damage dealt to enemy Heroes and 10% of damage dealt to non-Heroes.
trait.displayText: Mal'Ganis heals from damage dealt

abilities.name: Fel Claws
abilities.description: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 63 damage to enemies.  Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Swipe forward multiple times to deal damage

abilities.name: Necrotic Embrace
abilities.description: Desecrate the air, dealing 110 damage to nearby enemies and gaining 25 Armor for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Deal damage around Mal'Ganis and gain Armor

abilities.name: Night Rush
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Gain Move Speed and put enemies to Sleep

heroicAbilities.name: Carrion Swarm
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Disperse and deal damage in an area

heroicAbilities.name: Dark Conversion
heroicAbilities.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Channel to swap Health with an enemy Hero

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Mephisto
title: Lord of Hatred

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A sustained Assassin who thrives in battle against groups of enemies.
description: Dul’Mephistos, the Lord of Hatred, is said to be the most cunning among his brethren. Even while imprisoned in a soulstone, his vile influence corrupted the Zakarum and manipulated them into breaking the seal, giving him free reign to reunite the Prime Evils and enslave humanity.

trait.name: Lord Of Hatred
trait.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's Basic Ability cooldowns.  Skull Missile and Shade of Mephisto grant 1.5 seconds of cooldown reduction per Hero hit, and Lightning Nova grants 0.3 seconds per Hero hit.
trait.displayText: Hitting Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's cooldowns

abilities.name: Skull Missile
abilities.description: Conjure a skull that travels in the target direction after 0.75 seconds, dealing 127 damage to enemies hit and Slowing Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in a line after a short delay

abilities.name: Lightning Nova
abilities.description: A ring of lightning appears around Mephisto for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the ring take 45 damage every 0.25 seconds.  Each time a cast of Lightning Nova hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3%, up to 30%.
abilities.displayText: Deal increasing damage to nearby enemies

abilities.name: Shade of Mephisto
abilities.description: Teleport to a location, dealing 78 damage to nearby enemies and leaving behind a Shade of Mephisto at Mephisto's original location.   After 2.5 seconds, Mephisto is teleported back to the Shade's location.
abilities.displayText: Teleport to a location and return after a delay

heroicAbilities.name: Consume Souls
heroicAbilities.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and Slow all enemy Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Durance of Hate
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Unleash spirits that spread Roots

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Whitemane
title: High Inquisitor

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A versatile Healer who heals her allies by smiting her foes.
description: As the High Inquisitor of the Scarlet Crusade, Sally Whitemane zealously leads her champions in a neverending war against the undead. Under her guiding Light, all who have been touched by the plague of death will be purged by her cleansing flame... no matter how much they protest.

trait.name: Zeal
trait.description: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply Zeal for 8 seconds. Allies with Zeal are healed for 100% of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.  Activate to gain 25% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds. Can be cast while channeling abilities.
trait.displayText: Heal marked allies for damage dealt

abilities.name: Desperate Plea
abilities.description: Heal an allied Hero for 140 and gain Desperation for 4 seconds.  Desperation increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 45, and stacks up to 3 times.  Current Mana Cost: 45
abilities.displayText: Heal an allied Hero

abilities.name: Inquisition
abilities.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for up to 3 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds and Slowing them by 30%. Removes a stack of Desperation.  Shares a cooldown with Clemency.
abilities.displayText: Damage or heal Heroes

abilities.name: Searing Lash
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, smite enemies in a straight line for 82 damage.  If the first strike hits an enemy Hero, a second strike will occur after a short delay.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in a line

abilities.name: Clemency
abilities.description: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 329 over 3 seconds while Channeling. Removes a stack of Desperation  Shares a cooldown with Inquisition.
abilities.displayText: Heal allies with Inquisition

heroicAbilities.name: Scarlet Aegis
heroicAbilities.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Heal and grant Armor to nearby allies

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Reckoning
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Consecrate an area

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Yrel
title: Light of Hope

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A deliberate melee Bruiser whose heavyweight abilities reward investment and careful timing.
description: After traveling to an Alternate Draenor, the forces of Azeroth saved the acolyte Yrel from the Iron Horde. With their aid, she rose to the rank of Exarch and fought back the demonic invasion of her world. Now, she finds herself where time, space, and dimensions converge: the Nexus.

trait.name: Divine Purpose
trait.description: Activate to instantly charge Yrel's next Basic Ability at no mana cost.  Passive: Yrel's Basic Abilities charge up over 1.5 seconds, increasing in effectiveness, but reducing Yrel's Movement Speed by 25%.
trait.displayText: Make next Basic Ability cast instantly

abilities.name: Vindication
abilities.description: Unleash holy energy around Yrel, dealing 42 damage to nearby enemies and healing her for 96.  Charging up this Ability increases its damage up to 140, and healing up to 320.
abilities.displayText: Restore Health, damage enemies

abilities.name: Righteous Hammer
abilities.description: Swing Yrel's hammer, dealing 38 damage to enemies in front of her and knocking them away.  Charging up this Ability increases its knockback distance, and damage up to 125. Enemies hit at maximum charge are Stunned for 0.75 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Knockback and Stun enemies

abilities.name: Avenging Wrath
abilities.description: Leap to a location, dealing 225 damage to enemies in an area and Slowing them by 50% for 1 second.  Charging up this Ability increases its range.
abilities.displayText: Leap to an area to damage, Slow enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Ardent Defender
heroicAbilities.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Convert damage taken to Health

heroicAbilities.name: Sacred Ground
heroicAbilities.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 50 Armor until she leaves the area.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Yrel gains Armor in an area

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Deckard
title: The Last Horadrim

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A burst Healer who excels at preparing the battlefield before a fight and can cripple enemies with crowd control.
description: As an avid scholar, Deckard Cain has dedicated his life to the pursuit of knowledge. He has been an advisor, storyteller, and friend to Sanctuary's greatest heroes, guiding them through peril time and again. When Deckard speaks, it's wise to stay awhile and listen.

trait.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
trait.description: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.
trait.displayText: Nearby allies grant Armor, cooldown reduction

abilities.name: Healing Potion
abilities.description: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for 270.  Limit 5 active Potions.
abilities.displayText: Throw Potions that heal allies

abilities.name: Horadric Cube
abilities.description: Release the Horadric Cube. After 0.5 seconds it explodes, dealing 80 damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by 35% for 1.75 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage and Slow enemies in an area

abilities.name: Scroll Of Sealing
abilities.description: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over 2.25 seconds, forming a triangle that deals 150 damage to enemies inside and Roots them for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage and Root enemies in an area

heroicAbilities.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Put enemies to Sleep with a fascinating story

heroicAbilities.name: Lorenado
heroicAbilities.description: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Conjure a lorenado that knocks enemies away

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Fenix
title: Steward of the Templar

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A sustained damage Assassin with a regenerating Shield that enables him to efficiently duel his opponents.
description: As one of the greatest heroes in protoss history, Fenix's deeds on the battlefield are legendary. After falling to the zerg during the invasion of Aiur, his body was recovered and implanted into a dragoon so he could continue to fight. Not even death can stop Fenix from achieving glory and valor.

trait.name: Shield Capacitor
trait.description: Fenix has a permanent 760 Shield which regenerates at 10% per second after not taking damage for 5 seconds.
trait.displayText: Permanent Shield that regenerates out of combat

abilities.name: Plasma Cutter
abilities.description: Create a laser beam at the target point that circles around Fenix twice, dealing 135 damage to enemies hit and Slowing them by 25% for 4 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Summon a laser that circles Fenix, damaging and Slowing enemies

abilities.name: Weapon Modes
abilities.description: Activate to change between Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon and Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb.  Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon: Basic Attack speed increased by 150%.  Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb: Basic Attacks have 1.25 increased range, deal 25% more damage, and splash to nearby enemies.
abilities.displayText: Switch between Weapon Modes

abilities.name: Warp
abilities.description: Warp to a targeted location, phasing out after 0.5 seconds, and arriving 0.75 seconds later.
abilities.displayText: Warp to a location

heroicAbilities.name: Purification Salvo
heroicAbilities.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Fire a barrage of homing missiles

heroicAbilities.name: Planet Cracker
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Fire a laser across the battleground

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Maiev
title: The Warden

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A mobile Assassin that excels against clustered enemies and prevents their escape.
description: Maiev Shadowsong stood watch over the imprisoned Betrayer for ten thousand years, and hunted him relentlessly after he was released. Some say she's determined; others say she's obsessed. Either way, she will stop at nothing to ensure the security of her world.

trait.name: Vault of the Wardens
trait.description: Leap into the air, becoming Immune to all hostile effects for 0.75 seconds.
trait.displayText: Leap into the air, becoming temporarily Immune

abilities.name: Fan of Knives
abilities.description: Deal 152 damage to enemies in a crescent area.  Hitting at least 2 enemy Heroes with Fan of Knives reduces its cooldown to 0.5 seconds, and refunds its Mana cost.
abilities.displayText: Throw a volley of knives

abilities.name: Umbral Bind
abilities.description: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing 110 damage and breaking the tether.
abilities.displayText: Tether enemy Heroes to Maiev, pulling those that stray too far

abilities.name: Spirit of Vengeance
abilities.description: Send a shadow of Maiev outward that will return to its cast location, dealing 150 damage to enemies along both paths. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce the cooldown by 4 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Project a shadow of Maiev that she can later Blink to

heroicAbilities.name: Containment Disc
heroicAbilities.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Time Stop an enemy Hero and remove their vision

heroicAbilities.name: Warden's Cage
heroicAbilities.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Trap enemies in a cage of Avatars

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Blaze
title: Veteran Firebat

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A ranged Tank that specializes in initiating fights and dealing area damage by spreading his flames.
description: Cpl. Miles "Blaze" Lewis has always been drawn to the flame, but it wasn't until he joined up with Raynor's Raiders that he put his pyromania to good use. He's seen his fair share of battles since then, and has never failed to bring the heat.

trait.name: Pyromania
trait.description: Gain 40 Armor and deal 40 damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds.  Each Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces Pyromania's cooldown by 5 seconds.
trait.displayText: Gain Armor and damage nearby enemies

abilities.name: Flame Stream
abilities.description: Fire two streams that deal 83 damage to enemies hit. Flame Stream Ignites Oil Spills it comes in contact with.
abilities.displayText: Fire two streams of flames

abilities.name: Oil Spill
abilities.description: Vector Targeting Dispense a slick of oil that lasts for 5 seconds and Slows enemies that come in contact with it by 50%.  Oil Spills are Ignited for 2.5 seconds when hit by Flame Stream. Ignited Oil Spills no longer Slow enemies, but instead deal 16 damage to them every 0.3 seconds. Additionally, Blaze is healed for 49 Health every 0.3 seconds while standing in Ignited Oil Spills.  Stores up to 2 charges.
abilities.displayText: Splash oil that Slows and can be Ignited to damage enemies and heal Blaze

abilities.name: Jet Propulsion
abilities.description: After 0.375 seconds, charge forward. Colliding with an enemy Hero deals 52 damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stuns them for 1.25 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Charge forward, Stunning and damaging enemy Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Bunker Drop
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 damage to enemies in a line.   Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Call down a Bunker

heroicAbilities.name: Combustion
heroicAbilities.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Channel to damage and Slow enemies

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Hanzo
title: Master Assassin

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A ranged Assassin who specializes in scouting and taking out enemies from a distance.
description: Once heir to the Shimada clan's criminal empire, Hanzo abandoned his birthright after he almost killed his younger brother. He now strives to perfect his skills as a warrior, and sees the Nexus and its endless conflict as the ideal training ground.

trait.name: Natural Agility
trait.description: Jump over unpathable terrain or Structures, up to a maximum range.
trait.displayText: Jump over terrain

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Activate to charge an arrow that deals 291 damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled.
abilities.displayText: Charge up to fire a deadly arrow

abilities.name: Scatter Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 88 to the first enemy Hero hit. Scatter Arrow can collide with terrain and Structures, splitting into 5 arrows that travel extra distance, ricochet up to 4 additional times, and deal 88 damage each to the first enemy hit.
abilities.displayText: Fire an arrow that ricochets and splits

abilities.name: Sonic Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that grants vision in a large area for 5 seconds. Enemies inside are revealed for 1 second. If Sonic Arrow lands directly on an enemy, it deals 165 damage to them and follows them as they move.
abilities.displayText: Reveal a large area

heroicAbilities.name: Dragonstrike
heroicAbilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 84 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon a pair of Spirit Dragons to damage enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Dragon's Arrow
heroicAbilities.description: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Fire a global arrow that Stuns, damages

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Alexstrasza
title: The Life-Binder

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.
description: Alexstrasza, the queen of dragons, was empowered by the titans to be the guardian of all life on Azeroth. She has aided mortals time and again, even at great personal cost. Now, she soars across the Nexus, protecting life wherever she finds it.

trait.name: Dragonqueen
trait.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health.  While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, and Slows, is reduced by 50%.  Lasts 15 seconds.
trait.displayText: Transform into a dragon aspect with empowered Abilities

abilities.name: Gift of Life
abilities.description: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an allied Hero for 150% of that amount.  Dragonqueen: Breath of Life Cooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.
abilities.displayText: Give a portion of Health to an allied Hero

abilities.name: Abundance
abilities.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health.  Dragonqueen: Preservation Heal area and amount greatly increased.
abilities.displayText: Heal allied Heroes in an area

abilities.name: Flame Buffet
abilities.description: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 damage over 5.5 seconds.  Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.  Dragonqueen: Wing Buffet Damage and Knockback enemies in an arc.
abilities.displayText: Launch a fireball that ignites enemies and can Slow them

heroicAbilities.name: Life-Binder
heroicAbilities.description: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally

heroicAbilities.name: Cleansing Flame
heroicAbilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Junkrat
title: Junker Demolitionist

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A mobile Assassin that bombards the enemy from afar, and sows chaos with traps and mines.
description: The destruction of the Australian omnium left the area an irradiated waste and survivors like Jamison Fawkes were greatly affected by radiation. Now as the explosive-obsessed criminal Junkrat, he is renowned for leaving havoc and bedlam in his wake.

trait.name: Total Mayhem
trait.description: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 damage to nearby enemies. Deals 75% less damage to Structures.  Detonate Mine  Detonate an active Concussion Mine.
trait.displayText: Drop grenades upon death

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 118 damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.
abilities.displayText: Launch a bouncing grenade

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.  Limit 1 active mine.
abilities.displayText: Place a mine that can be detonated

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.description: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds.  Limit 1 active trap.
abilities.displayText: Place a trap that Roots enemies

heroicAbilities.name: RIP-Tire
heroicAbilities.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 720 damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 445 to enemies on the edge.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Create a motorized bomb that explodes

heroicAbilities.name: Rocket Ride
heroicAbilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 890 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Launch into the air, damaging enemies upon landing

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Ana
title: Veteran Sniper

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A burst Healer who uses precise skillshots to heal allies and can deny enemy healing.
description: As a founding member of Overwatch and one of the world's best snipers, Ana Amari uses her skills to protect the innocent. Though she went MIA after losing her eye, Ana's sense of duty and responsibility has brought her back to the fight.

trait.name: Shrike
trait.description: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing 40 damage over 5 seconds, plus additional damage equal to the current number of stacks on the target, stacking up to 5 times. Every 0.5 seconds, Ana is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Shrike.  Aim Down Sights  Activating Shrike reduces your Movement Speed by 25%, but increases the Range of Healing Dart and Sleep Dart by 25% while also allowing them to pierce one Hero. Lasts until canceled.
trait.displayText: Empowers Basic Attacks, Healing Dart, and Sleep Dart

abilities.name: Healing Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 195 Health. Does not affect full Health Heroes.
abilities.displayText: Shoot a dart that heals an Ally

abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Toss a grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for 152 Health and receive 25% increased healing from Ana for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Toss a grenade that heals allies, prevents enemy healing

abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds.  Cannot be used on Vehicles.
abilities.displayText: Fire a dart that puts enemies to Sleep

heroicAbilities.name: Nano Boost
heroicAbilities.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns

heroicAbilities.name: Eye of Horus
heroicAbilities.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 and enemies are damaged for 135. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Fire unlimited range healing and damaging rounds

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Kel'Thuzad
title: Archlich of Naxxramas

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A burst damage Mage that locks down enemies and devastates them with powerful combos.
description: Kel'Thuzad has faithfully served the Lich King both in life and after death. Reanimated as the Archlich of the Scourge and given domain of the Dread Necropolis, Naxxramas, Kel’Thuzad remains Arthas’s most trusted advisor and master of the cold dark.

trait.name: Master of the Cold Dark
trait.description: Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.  Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, gain the Glacial Spike Ability.  Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.  Blight: 0/30
trait.displayText: Kel'Thuzad becomes increasingly stronger as he disrupts enemies

abilities.name: Death and Decay
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 82 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies and create a damaging pool

abilities.name: Frost Nova
abilities.description: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 180 damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.
abilities.displayText: Damage and disable enemies

abilities.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
abilities.description: Launch a chain, dealing 97 damage to the first enemy Hero hit. For 3 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Pull enemy Heroes together

heroicAbilities.name: Frost Blast
heroicAbilities.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 damage to its target and 275 damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Root and damage enemies around a target

heroicAbilities.name: Shadow Fissure
heroicAbilities.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Deal high damage in an area

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Garrosh
title: Son of Hellscream

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A frontline Tank that enters the fray, trying to isolate a single opponent for elimination.
description: As the new warchief of the Horde, Garrosh is a proud and vicious warrior who rules with an iron fist. His hatred for the Alliance burns like wildfire, and he will stop at nothing to destroy them. By his axe, the orcs will reclaim their rightful glory.

trait.name: Armor Up
trait.description: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.
trait.displayText: Gain Armor as Health gets lower

abilities.name: Groundbreaker
abilities.description: Deal 81 damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are Stunned for 0.5 seconds and then Slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Deal damage to enemies, can Stun them

abilities.name: Bloodthirst
abilities.description: Deal 156 damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.
abilities.displayText: Deal damage and heal for a portion of missing Health

abilities.name: Wrecking Ball
abilities.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Throw an enemy, damaging and Slowing them

heroicAbilities.name: Warlord's Challenge
heroicAbilities.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Force nearby Heroes to attack Garrosh

heroicAbilities.name: Decimate
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and Slow nearby enemies

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Stukov
title: Infested Admiral

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A Healer that brings high amounts of disruption from long range.
description: Alexei Stukov had a hard life, and an even harder death. He has been betrayed, shot into space, resurrected and infested, almost cured, and then experimented upon as the infestation returned. Now, his infestation spreads within the Nexus...

trait.name: Bio-Kill Switch
trait.description: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 450 Health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds.  Can be cast while Channeling Lurking Arm.
trait.displayText: Detonate Viruses for immediate effects

abilities.name: Healing Pathogen
abilities.description: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 222 Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds.  Each cast of Healing Pathogen can only spread to each allied Hero 1 time.
abilities.displayText: Infest allies with a spreading healing Virus

abilities.name: Weighted Pustule
abilities.description: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 88 damage upon expiring or being removed.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies and infest them with a Slowing Virus

abilities.name: Lurking Arm
abilities.description: Channel at a target location, creating an area that deals 136 damage per second to non-Structure enemies and Silences them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.  Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.
abilities.displayText: Continually damage and Silence enemies in an area

heroicAbilities.name: Flailing Swipe
heroicAbilities.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Knock back enemies in front of Stukov

heroicAbilities.name: Massive Shove
heroicAbilities.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Shove an enemy until they collide with terrain

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Malthael
title: Aspect of Death

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A Bruiser who marks his enemies, shredding away high Health enemies.
description: Once the Aspect of Wisdom, Malthael abandoned heaven after the Worldstone's destruction. In secret, he had resolved to end the Eternal Conflict by becoming a Reaper of Souls and eliminating everything affected by demonic corruption, including humanity.

trait.name: Reaper's Mark
trait.description: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds.  Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health every 1 second.
trait.displayText: Basic Attacks cleave, apply Reaper's Mark

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 damage and healing Malthael for 25 per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.
abilities.displayText: Damage Marked enemies and heal

abilities.name: Wraith Strike
abilities.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.
abilities.displayText: Teleport to a Marked target

abilities.name: Death Shroud
abilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.
abilities.displayText: Unleash a wave that applies Reaper's Mark

heroicAbilities.name: Tormented Souls
heroicAbilities.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Apply Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Last Rites
heroicAbilities.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 20 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Quest: Damage a Hero based on their missing Health

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: D.Va
title: MEKA Pilot

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A hard-to-kill Bruiser that can peel enemies away from her allies with high disruption.
description: Hana Song, also known as "D.Va," is both a world champion professional gamer and a burgeoning global icon. As a member of South Korea’s elite MEKA unit, she fights to protect her homeland from the colossal omnic threat lurking within the East China Sea.

trait.name: Mech Mode
trait.description: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.
trait.displayText: D.Va can eject from her Mech and continue to fight

abilities.name: Boosters
abilities.description: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away.   D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.
abilities.displayText: Move fast and knockback enemies

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn.  Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.
abilities.displayText: Reduce damage of enemy Heroes in an area

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 1200 to 400 damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures.  Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.
abilities.displayText: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct for massive damage

heroicAbilities.name: Bunny Hop
heroicAbilities.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Become Unstoppable and Slow nearby Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Big Shot
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 250 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Genji
title: Cybernetic Ninja

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: An opportunistic, mobile Assassin who can tear apart a weak backline.
description: Once the carefree youngest scion of the Shimada clan, Genji was cut down by his own brother for refusing to take part in their illegal ventures. Grafted into a cyborg body by Overwatch, Genji walks his own path as one who fights for what's right.

trait.name: Cyber Agility
trait.description: Activate to jump to the target area.
trait.displayText: Jump over terrain

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 damage to the first enemy hit.  Stores up to 3 charges.  Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.
abilities.displayText: Throw Shuriken in a spread pattern

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 damage.  Total Damage Deflected: 0
abilities.displayText: Become Protected and return fire from attacks

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, dealing 190 damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.
abilities.displayText: Dash forward damaging enemies passed through

heroicAbilities.name: Dragonblade
heroicAbilities.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Unleash the Dragonblade

heroicAbilities.name: X-Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Perform two slashes dealing 145 damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 290 damage to enemies in their area.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Deal heavy damage in a cross shape

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Cassia
title: Amazon Warmatron

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: An Assassin who specializes against Physical Attackers.
description: After shattering the Worldstone, the young Amazon Cassia had changed. She had seen hatred, terror, and destruction firsthand. If the Askari were to survive the coming darkness, they needed an army. She would begin their training immediately.

trait.name: Avoidance
trait.description: While moving, Cassia gradually gains up to 30 Armor over 3 seconds. After being stationary for 0.75 seconds, the Armor is rapidly lost over .5 seconds.   Avoidance remains charged while Fending.
trait.displayText: Gain Armor while moving

abilities.name: Lightning Fury
abilities.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 165 damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 165 damage to enemies in their path.
abilities.displayText: Hurl a lightning javelin that splits upon impact

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 50 damage and Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds.  Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.
abilities.displayText: Blind enemies in an area

abilities.name: Fend
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving Channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 68 damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes. Avoidance remains charged while Channeling.
abilities.displayText: Charge at a target and rapidly attack nearby enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Ball Lightning
heroicAbilities.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 damage to enemies hit.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Throw a bouncing lightning ball

heroicAbilities.name: Valkyrie
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon a Valkyrie to impale enemies

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Probius
title: Curious Probe

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A high damage Summoner that must stay near Pylons to be effective.
description: Since his activation, Probius has always wanted to prove himself. He may be small, but he made a big difference by warping in a critical pylon during the retaking of Aiur. As the bravest of probes, Probius is eager to fulfill his purpose in the Nexus.

trait.name: Warp In Pylon
trait.description: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field.  Up to 2 Pylons can be active at a time.
trait.displayText: Summon a Pylon that renergizes Probius and allows the construction of other buildings

abilities.name: Disruption Pulse
abilities.description: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing 142 damage to all enemies it passes through.  Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.
abilities.displayText: Fire a missile in a line that damages enemies and detonates Warp Rifts

abilities.name: Warp Rift
abilities.description: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes 1.25 seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by 25% lasting 9 seconds.  Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing 261 damage to nearby enemies.  Stores up to 2 charges.
abilities.displayText: Create a rift that slows enemies and can be detonated with Disruption Pulse

abilities.name: Photon Cannon
abilities.description: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals 105 damage per second. Lasts for 13 seconds.  Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field.  Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.
abilities.displayText: Create a cannon that attacks nearby enemies

abilities.name: Worker Rush
abilities.description: Activate to gain an additional 60% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early.  Worker Rush is always active while at the Hall of Storms.  Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.
abilities.displayText: Move faster passively.  Activate to move even faster.

heroicAbilities.name: Pylon Overcharge
heroicAbilities.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Weaponize Pylons

heroicAbilities.name: Null Gate
heroicAbilities.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 damage per second and are Slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Create a Slowing barrier

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Lúcio
title: Freedom Fighting DJ

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A sustained Healer who gives his team mobility and peels enemies off allies.
description: From the streets of Rio to the clubs on King's Row, Lúcio's beats bring the party to life, and drive the people to action. Now he's on tour in the Nexus, ready to break it down, and to continue fighting for what's right.

trait.name: Push Off
trait.description: While moving alongside terrain, activate to slide towards a targeted location. Enemies hit take 100 damage and are Slowed by 75% for 1 second.
trait.displayText: Push off a wall to Slow enemies

abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Deal 105 damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.
abilities.displayText: Knockback nearby enemies

abilities.name: Crossfade
abilities.description: Play one of two music tracks for Lúcio and his allies.  Healing Boost: Passively heal Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes for 15 health per second.  Speed Boost: Increase the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by 10%.
abilities.displayText: Play a Healing Boost or Speed Boost track

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Raise Lúcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 112 Health per second and Speed Boost to 30% increased Movement Speed.
abilities.displayText: Boost the effect of Lúcio's Crossfade track

abilities.name: Wall Ride
abilities.description: When moving alongside terrain, Lúcio begins to Wall Ride for 2 seconds. While Wall Ride is active, Lúcio can walk through units and gains 20% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.
abilities.displayText: Lúcio gains Move Speed near terrain and can move through units

heroicAbilities.name: Sound Barrier
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Shield nearby allies

heroicAbilities.name: High Five
heroicAbilities.description: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Skate to allies, healing and granting Unstoppable

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Valeera
title: Shadow of the Uncrowned

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin who specializes in shutting down her opponents.
description: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.

trait.name: Vanish
trait.description: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining 20% Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  After being Stealthed for 3 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have 100% increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.
trait.displayText: Stealth and gain new Abilities

abilities.name: Sinister Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Stealth: Ambush Heavily damage an enemy and reduce their Armor.
abilities.displayText: Dash forward, damaging enemies in a line

abilities.name: Blade Flurry
abilities.description: Deal 130 damage in an area around Valeera.   Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit.  Stealth: Cheap Shot Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy.
abilities.displayText: Damage nearby enemies

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point.   1 Point: 85 2 Points: 170 3 Points: 255  Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.
abilities.displayText: High damage finishing move
abilities.cooldown: Cooldown: 1 second Consumes all Combo Points

heroicAbilities.name: Smoke Bomb
heroicAbilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Create an obscuring cloud of smoke

heroicAbilities.name: Cloak of Shadows
heroicAbilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Become Unstoppable, gain Spell Armor

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Zul'jin
title: Warlord of the Amani

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A Physical Damage Assassin that gains power while losing Health.
description: Before the elves and their Alliance, the forests of Lordaeron belonged to the trolls of the Amani empire. As their warlord, Zul'jin has united the tribes into an army that stands ready to take back what is theirs and to slay the elves who stole it from them.

trait.name: Berserker
trait.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.  Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.  You Want Axe?  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.
trait.displayText: Increased Attack Speed as Health gets lower

abilities.name: Grievous Throw
abilities.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.
abilities.displayText: Throw an Axe, damaging and marking a target, increasing Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Twin Cleave
abilities.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 112 damage and Slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Throw swirling Axes that Slow enemies

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.
abilities.displayText: Zul'jin Channels to regenerate Health over time

abilities.name: Amani Rage
abilities.description: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Activate to lose Health and restore it over time

heroicAbilities.name: Taz'dingo!
heroicAbilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!
heroicAbilities.displayText: Become unkillable

heroicAbilities.name: Guillotine
heroicAbilities.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Deal heavy area damage

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Ragnaros
title: The Firelord

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A Bruiser that can nullify enemy pushes against his Forts and Keeps.
description: As the lord of Azeroth’s fire elementals, Ragnaros desires nothing more than to burn the world to ash. Banished to the Firelands eons ago, the Firelord now turns his rage toward the Nexus, intent on incinerating everything and everyone within it.

trait.name: Molten Core
trait.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 Health that burns away over 18 seconds.  Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.
trait.displayText: Take over a destroyed or Allied fort to unleash Ragnaros's full power

abilities.name: Empower Sulfuras
abilities.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.  Molten Core: Molten Swing Stun and damage nearby enemies.
abilities.displayText: Deal damage in an area and heal Ragnaros

abilities.name: Living Meteor
abilities.description: Vector Targeting Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing 272 damage per second for 1.75 seconds.  Molten Core: Meteor Shower Drop a line of meteor impacts.
abilities.displayText: Summon a meteor to damage enemies in a line

abilities.name: Blast Wave
abilities.description: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 damage to nearby enemies.  Molten Core: Explosive Rune Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.
abilities.displayText: Cause a delayed explosion around an ally

heroicAbilities.name: Sulfuras Smash
heroicAbilities.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 250 damage. Enemies in the center take 594 damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and Stun enemies in an area

heroicAbilities.name: Lava Wave
heroicAbilities.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Send a wave of lava down a lane

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Varian
title: High King of the Alliance

role.name: Multiclass
role.description: Multiclass Heroes defined by their talents rather than role.

shortDescription: A Bruiser that can flex into dealing damage or protecting his team.
description: Few would have expected that the gladiator known only as Lo'Gosh was in truth the missing ruler of Stormwind, Varian Wrynn. Now the High King of the Alliance, his every action shapes the destiny of Azeroth itself.

trait.name: Heroic Strike
trait.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 125 bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.
trait.displayText: Deal bonus damage on next Basic Attack

abilities.name: Lion's Fang
abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for 35, increased to 140 against Heroes.
abilities.displayText: Damage and Slow enemies in a line and heal Varian

abilities.name: Parry
abilities.description: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%.  Stores up to 2 charges.
