abilities.displayText: Block incoming Basic Attacks for a short duration

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 damage and Slowing them by 75% for 1 second.
abilities.displayText: Charge to an enemy and damage them

heroicAbilities.name: Taunt
heroicAbilities.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Gain Health Force a Hero to attack Varian

heroicAbilities.name: Colossus Smash
heroicAbilities.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Gain Damage, Lose Health Smash enemies and lower their Armor

heroicAbilities.name: Twin Blades of Fury
heroicAbilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Gain Attack Speed, Lose Damage Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike cooldown

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Samuro
title: The Blademaster

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin that's great at capturing Mercenary camps and is difficult to kill.
description: Samuro, the last remaining blademaster to wear the banner of the Burning Blade, is on a warrior's pilgrimage in search of vengeance and redemption for his fallen clan. It will be a long journey, but he has sworn an oath to restore his clan's honor.

trait.name: Image Transmission
trait.description: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.  Advancing Strikes  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.
trait.displayText: Increase Movement Speed when attacking Heroes

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Teleport a short distance in the direction of the mouse cursor, creating 2 Mirror Images for 8 seconds with 100% of Samuro's current Health that Basic Attack enemies for 11 damage. Images have their duration increased by 1 second each time they or Samuro use a Basic Attack against an enemy Hero. Whenever an Image takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.  Maximum 2 Mirror Images can be active at at time. Using Mirror Image removes most negative effects from Samuro.
abilities.displayText: Create Mirror Images to confuse and attack enemies

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.  Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.
abilities.displayText: Critically Strike for increased damage.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Grant Samuro Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until he attacks, uses an Ability, or takes damage.  While Stealthed, Samuro heals for 1% of his maximum Health every second, his Movement Speed is increased by 25% and he can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Samuro is Unrevealable for the first 1 second of Wind Walk.
abilities.displayText: Become Stealthed and gain Movement Speed

heroicAbilities.name: Bladestorm
heroicAbilities.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 3 seconds, granting him 25 Armor and dealing 180 damage per second to nearby enemies.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force

heroicAbilities.name: Illusion Master
heroicAbilities.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.   Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Mirror Images can be controlled

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Zarya
title: Defender of Russia

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Support that can enable deadly allies and is good at preventing burst damage.
description: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women and was a promising athlete, but all that changed when the Siberian omnium reawakened. As a soldier in the Russian Defense Force, she now proudly uses her strength to protect the ones she loves.

trait.name: Energy
trait.description: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 9 damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 3 per second.
trait.displayText: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields increase her damage.

abilities.name: Particle Grenade
abilities.description: Launch a particle grenade that deals 75 damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.  Stores up to 4 charges.
abilities.displayText: Deals damage to enemies in a small area

abilities.name: Personal Barrier
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 560 damage for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Gain a Shield that absorbs damage

abilities.name: Shield Ally
abilities.description: Grants an allied Hero a Shield that absorbs 420 damage for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Grant an ally a Shield that absorbs damage

heroicAbilities.name: Graviton Surge
heroicAbilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Launch a gravity bomb that draws in enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Expulsion Zone
heroicAbilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Launch a bomb that continually pushes enemies

expandedRole.name: Support
expandedRole.description: Support Make allies stronger and deadlier. Buff, augment, shield, and provide utility to the team.

name: Alarak
title: Highlord of the Tal'darim

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A combo Assassin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.
description: Not all heroes are born of altruism... some, like Alarak, simply desire vengeance. As the new Highlord of the Tal'darim, Alarak leads his people to a destiny free of the corrupt influence of the fallen xel'naga, Amon.

trait.name: Sadism
trait.description: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.  Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.
trait.displayText: Alarak deals increased damage and has increased self-healing against enemy Heroes

abilities.name: Discord Strike
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 165 damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage and silence enemies in an area

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Vector Targeting Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 damage to enemies.
abilities.displayText: Push enemies towards a location

abilities.name: Lightning Surge
abilities.description: Deal 62 damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 health for each Hero hit.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in a line

heroicAbilities.name: Deadly Charge
heroicAbilities.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Channel to charge a long distance

heroicAbilities.name: Counter-Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Auriel
title: Archangel of Hope

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A Healer that excels when paired with a high-octane damage dealer.
description: It is through the archangel Auriel that the power of hope flows into the fabric of creation. Her eternal light illuminates even the darkest souls. Seeking harmony in all things, she is a mediator, a counselor, and when the need arises, a fearless warrior.

trait.name: Bestow Hope
trait.description: Passive: 60% of the damage Auriel deals to Heroes and 20% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy.  Bestow an allied Hero with Hope.  While they remain near Auriel, 30% of their damage to Heroes and 10% of their damage to non-Heroes is converted to energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time.  Auriel can store up to 475 energy.
trait.displayText: Bestowed ally's damage grants energy

abilities.name: Sacred Sweep
abilities.description: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing 40 damage to enemies and an additional 160 damage to enemies caught in the center.
abilities.displayText: Damages enemies in an a wide arc, bonus damage to enemies in the center

abilities.name: Ray of Heaven
abilities.description: Consume Auriel's stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.
abilities.displayText: Spend all energy to heal allied Heroes in an area

abilities.name: Detainment Strike
abilities.description: Deal 55 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for 1.25 seconds and take an additional 165 damage.
abilities.displayText: Knock an enemy Hero back, stunning them if they collide with terrain

heroicAbilities.name: Crystal Aegis
heroicAbilities.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 damage to all nearby enemies.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Put an allied Hero into a Stasis crystal that explodes

heroicAbilities.name: Resurrect
heroicAbilities.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 1 second. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 100% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.  Auriel can use this ability while dead to resurrect herself.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Bring an allied Hero back to life

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Gul'dan
title: Darkness Incarnate

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A sustained damage Mage who uses his health as fuel but can steal life from his enemies.
description: Abandoning the ways of shamanism, Gul'dan entered a pact with the demon lord Kil'jaeden and betrayed his people in exchange for limitless power. With the orcish Horde under his master's thrall, both Draenor and Azeroth nearly fell into his grasp.

trait.name: Life Tap
trait.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.  Activate to restore 25% of Gul'dan's Mana.
trait.displayText: Restore Mana at the cost of Health

abilities.name: Fel Flame
abilities.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 210 damage to enemies.
abilities.displayText: Release a wave of flame that damages enemies

abilities.name: Drain Life
abilities.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 Health per second.
abilities.displayText: Drain Health from an enemy, dealing damage and healing Gul'dan

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.
abilities.displayText: Deals damage over time to enemies in the area

heroicAbilities.name: Horrify
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Deals damage and Fears Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Rain of Destruction
heroicAbilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 damage in a small area.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon a rain of meteors in an area

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Medivh
title: The Last Guardian

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A Support who can negate burst damage and allow his allies to teleport.
description: Under the demon lord Sargeras's influence, Medivh opened the Dark Portal and unleashed the Horde upon Azeroth. To atone for this sin, he rallied a new generation of heroes to stand against the Burning Legion. Now, he takes his place amongst legends.

trait.name: Raven Form
trait.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.
trait.displayText: Transform into a raven

abilities.name: Arcane Rift
abilities.description: Launch a rift that deals 170 damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.  Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying.  Reward: Permanently increase the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.
abilities.displayText: Launch an arcane bolt that damages enemies in a line

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.  Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 20% of the damage it absorbed.
abilities.displayText: Protect an allied Hero from damage

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Create a portal that allies can pass through

heroicAbilities.name: Poly Bomb
heroicAbilities.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Polymorph a Hero that spreads to other Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Ley Line Seal
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Unleash a wave that Time Stops enemy Heroes

expandedRole.name: Support
expandedRole.description: Support Make allies stronger and deadlier. Buff, augment, shield, and provide utility to the team.

name: Chromie
title: Keeper of Time

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A long range, high burst damage Mage, who requires good timing and setup.
description: At first glance, Chromie appears to be an ordinary gnome. In truth, she is Chronormu, Bronze Dragon and a master of time. When it comes to temporal manipulation there's no problem she can't solve... with some help from her future self, of course.

trait.name: Timewalker
trait.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!  Detonate Time Trap  Detonates active Time Traps.
trait.displayText: Gain Talents earlier than everyone else

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, fire a missile that deals 305 damage to the first enemy hit. Deals 50% damage to Structures.  Casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind that mimics Chromie's Sand Blast and Basic Attack, dealing 40% damage. Maximum of 1 Echo active at a time.
abilities.displayText: Fire a long range blast that damages an enemy

abilities.name: Dragon’s Breath
abilities.description: Vector Targeting Launch 3 blasts into the air that land every 0.75 seconds towards the targeted direction, dealing 215 damage each.
abilities.displayText: Fire a series of blasts in an area

abilities.name: Time Trap
abilities.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. Chromie's Trait can be activated to detonate the trap, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Maximum of 1 trap active at a time.
abilities.displayText: Place a trap that Time Stops Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Slowing Sands
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 7% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Create a Slowing area

heroicAbilities.name: Temporal Loop
heroicAbilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Tracer
title: Agent of Overwatch

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A mobile Assassin who picks off straggling enemies, finishing them off.
description: Lena Oxton (call sign: "Tracer"), is both an adventurer and an irrepressible force for good. With the ability to alter her own time at will, she fights the good fight wherever she goes--even the Nexus. Don't worry, loves. The cavalry's finally here.  Tracer is FREE to purchasers of Overwatch™: Origins Edition

trait.name: Reload
trait.description: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times she needs to reload over 0.75 seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.  Basic Attacks heal Tracer for 10% of the damage dealt.
trait.displayText: Tracer can move while Basic Attacking; Basic Attacks cost ammo

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Dash towards an area. Stores up to 3 charges.
abilities.displayText: Dash towards an area

abilities.name: Melee
abilities.description: Deal 220 damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 6% Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and 12% against Heroes.
abilities.displayText: Attack a nearby enemy

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, Tracer returns to the position she was at 2 seconds prior to casting, refilling her ammo, and removing all negative status effects from herself.
abilities.displayText: Return to a recent location and remove negative effects

heroicAbilities.name: Pulse Bomb
heroicAbilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that can attach to an enemy if it hits them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 288 damage to them and 144 damage to other nearby enemies.  This ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Attach a bomb to enemies that deals heavy damage

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Dehaka
title: Primal Pack Leader

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Bruiser with a strong, global presence that can effectively clear groups of minions.
description: Cunning and wise, Dehaka is one of the last surviving pack leaders of the forgotten world of Zerus. As with all primal zerg, he is driven by a powerful desire to consume the essence of his foes and evolve into newer and more deadly forms.

trait.name: Essence Collection
trait.description: Heal Dehaka for a small amount per stored Essence over 5 seconds. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.  Passive: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Maximum of 50 Essence.
trait.displayText: Killing enemy Heroes or Minions stores Essence that will heal over time when activated

abilities.name: Drag
abilities.description: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 damage to the first enemy hit, Stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds.  If Dehaka is Stunned or Silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.
abilities.displayText: Deal light damage and drag an enemy

abilities.name: Dark Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 49 damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.
abilities.displayText: Damage nearby enemies

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Gain Stasis by burrowing into the ground

abilities.name: Brushstalker
abilities.description: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground.  Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.
abilities.displayText: Burrow to a bush on the Battleground.

heroicAbilities.name: Isolation
heroicAbilities.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Silence, Slow, and reduce vision of an enemy

heroicAbilities.name: Adaptation
heroicAbilities.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Heal back damage taken

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Xul
title: Cryptic Necromancer

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A Summoner who can push multiple lanes with ease.
description: From the recesses of the eastern jungles comes a man cloaked in mystery. As a member of the secretive Priests of Rathma, or the Necromancers, Xul wields powerful death magic and fights to preserve the delicate balance between order and chaos.

trait.name: Raise Skeleton
trait.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 240 Health that attacks for 21 damage and lasts up to 12 seconds. Upon death, Skeletal Warriors deal 46 damage to nearby enemies.  Up to 3 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once when spawned in this way.
trait.displayText: Spawn Skeletal Warriors from Minions

abilities.name: Spectral Scythe
abilities.description: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 200 damage to enemies and spawning a Skeletal Warrior when hitting enemy Heroes.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.
abilities.displayText: Throw a scythe that damages enemies as it returns to Xul

abilities.name: Cursed Strikes
abilities.description: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.
abilities.displayText: Basic Attacks deal damage in an area and reduce Attack Speed

abilities.name: Bone Prison
abilities.description: After a 2 second delay, deal 80 damage and Root the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds.  All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.
abilities.displayText: Root an enemy in place

abilities.name: Bone Armor
abilities.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of Xul's maximum Health for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Activate to gain a Shield

heroicAbilities.name: Poison Nova
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Poison enemies in a large area

heroicAbilities.name: Skeletal Mages
heroicAbilities.description: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon Frost Mages to damage and Slow enemies

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Li-Ming
title: Rebellious Wizard

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A high burst damage Mage who can reset her Abilities upon getting a takedown.
description: The derogatory moniker "wizard" is often given to mages with rebellious attitudes or an obsession with power. Li-Ming displays a little of both and she's hardly ashamed of it. After all, who are they to judge a wielder of limitless arcane magic?

trait.name: Critical Mass
trait.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.
trait.displayText: Takedowns refresh Li-Ming's Ability cooldowns

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.
abilities.displayText: Fire a volley of missiles

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 damage to the first enemy hit. Damage is increased the further it travels, up to 270 more damage.
abilities.displayText: Launch an orb that deals increasing damage the further it travels

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleport a short distance instantly.
abilities.displayText: Teleport a short distance

heroicAbilities.name: Disintegrate
heroicAbilities.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Long range channeled beam

heroicAbilities.name: Wave of Force
heroicAbilities.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and knock enemies back

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Greymane
title: Lord of the Worgen

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A high damage Assassin that wears down enemies from afar and dives in for the kill.  10 Armor (in Worgen Form)
description: Like most Gilneans, Genn Greymane is afflicted by the worgen curse. Though he feels at fault for his people’s ill fate, he has embraced his inner beast without giving in to its feral nature. Now he leads his pack as both their alpha and their king.

trait.name: Curse of the Worgen
trait.description: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.  While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged.  While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal 40% more damage.
trait.displayText: Able to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen

abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 55 damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 220 damage to enemies in a cone behind them.  Worgen: Razor Swipe Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.
abilities.displayText: Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Gain a massive Attack Speed boost

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 damage.  Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.
abilities.displayText: Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen

heroicAbilities.name: Go for the Throat
heroicAbilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Eviscerate a Hero, refresh cooldown if they die

heroicAbilities.name: Cursed Bullet
heroicAbilities.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 40% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Remove a portion of enemy's current Health

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Lunara
title: First Daughter of Cenarius

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A sustained Assassin who can wear down her enemies from afar with her poison.
description: While her younger sisters frolicked in idyllic forests, Lunara watched as mortals exploited nature’s splendor. On Azeroth, her father Cenarius forbade her from retaliating. But this is the Nexus, and it’s time for nature to take its revenge.

trait.name: Nature's Toxin
trait.description: Lunara's Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 36 damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.
trait.displayText: Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities deal damage over time

abilities.name: Noxious Blossom
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 160 damage.
abilities.displayText: Deals area damage

abilities.name: Crippling Spores
abilities.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are Slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Slow enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin and extend duration

abilities.name: Wisp
abilities.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. When the Wisp is in a bush for more 2 seconds, its vision radius is increased by 75%.  Lasts 45 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Spawns a Wisp to scout

abilities.name: Relocate Wisp
abilities.description: Moves the Wisp to a new location.
abilities.displayText: Move the Wisp to a new location

heroicAbilities.name: Thornwood Vine
heroicAbilities.description: Send forth vines that deal 176 damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damages in a line

heroicAbilities.name: Leaping Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Leap over enemies, damaging and Slowing

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Cho
title: Twilight's Hammer Chieftain

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: Head 1 of a 2 Headed Hero, Cho controls the body of Cho'gall.
description: Cho’gall is one of the most powerful, intelligent, and insane ogre-magi to have ever lived. As the leader of the Twilight's Hammer the two brothers seek to bring about an age of destruction... whenever they aren’t bickering that is.

trait.name: Ogre Hide
trait.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.
trait.displayText: Activate to increase Armor

abilities.name: Surging Fist
abilities.description: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.
abilities.displayText: Dash a direction knocking aside enemies

abilities.name: Consuming Blaze
abilities.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 when an enemy is Ignited.
abilities.displayText: Damage nearby enemies and heal Cho

abilities.name: Rune Bomb
abilities.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 210 damage in an area.
abilities.displayText: Throw a Rune Bomb down a line. Gall can detonate it to do area damage

heroicAbilities.name: Hammer of Twilight
heroicAbilities.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Activate to knockback and Stun enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Upheaval
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, Slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Pull enemies in a large area

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Gall
title: Twilight's Hammer Chieftain

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: Head 2 of a 2 Headed Hero, Gall is a powerful Mage stuck to Cho.
description: Cho’gall is one of the most powerful, intelligent, and insane ogre-magi to have ever lived. As the leader of the Twilight's Hammer the two brothers seek to bring about an age of destruction... whenever they aren’t bickering that is.

trait.name: Ogre Rage
trait.description: Activate to increase Gall's damage by 25%, but reduce Cho's Armor by 25.  Passive: Gall is permanently immune to Stun and Silence effects.
trait.displayText: Activate to increase Gall's Damage

abilities.name: Shadowflame
abilities.description: Deal 135 damage to enemies in the area.
abilities.displayText: Blast enemies in a narrow line

abilities.name: Dread Orb
abilities.description: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 126 damage to enemies.
abilities.displayText: Lob a ball of energy that bounces three times, damaging enemies it hits

abilities.name: Runic Blast
abilities.description: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 210 damage around it.
abilities.displayText: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing area damage

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.description: Nudge Cho a small distance and grant him 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Nudge Cho a short distance

heroicAbilities.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Launch a barrage of Shadow Bolts

heroicAbilities.name: Twisting Nether
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Slow and damage nearby enemies

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Artanis
title: Hierarch of the Daelaam

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A tough Bruiser that deals high damage if the enemy team is unable to shut him down.
description: Despite his relative youth, Artanis was named Hierarch of the Daelaam after the fall of Aiur. Driven by the promise of a brighter future, he hopes to reclaim the protoss' fallen home world and rebuild their once glorious civilization.  Artanis is FREE to purchasers of StarCraft® II: Legacy of the Void™

trait.name: Shield Overload
trait.description: After taking damage while below 75% Health, Artanis gains a 385 Shield for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.
trait.displayText: Gain a Shield when attacked at low Health

abilities.name: Blade Dash
abilities.description: Dash forward and deal 57 damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Dash forward then back again, damaging enemies along the way

abilities.name: Twin Blades
abilities.description: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.
abilities.displayText: Charge and Basic Attack twice

abilities.name: Phase Prism
abilities.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 damage to the first Hero hit and swaps Artanis's position with theirs. Can be used during Blade Dash.
abilities.displayText: Swap positions with an enemy Hero

heroicAbilities.name: Suppression Pulse
heroicAbilities.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and Blind enemies in a large area

heroicAbilities.name: Purifier Beam
heroicAbilities.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Chase an enemy with an orbital beam

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Lt. Morales
title: Combat Medic

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A strong, sustained Healer who's unbeatable if left alone by her enemies.
description: To good marines, the only thing more important than the rifle in their hand is the medic at their back. As one of the first officers deployed during the United Earth Directorate's invasion, Lt. Rosa Morales is the best of the best.

trait.name: Caduceus Reactor
trait.description: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.
trait.displayText: Restore Health while channeling Healing Beam

abilities.name: Healing Beam
abilities.description: Heal target allied Hero or Minion for 172 Health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second.  Reactivate to switch targets, or self-cast to cancel channeling.
abilities.displayText: Heals allies over time

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Grant target ally Hero 30 Armor for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Grants Armor to the target

abilities.name: Displacement Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 208 to nearby enemies and knocking them away.
abilities.displayText: Damages and knocks enemies away

heroicAbilities.name: Stim Drone
heroicAbilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed

heroicAbilities.name: Medivac Dropship
heroicAbilities.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Transport allies across long distances

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Rexxar
title: Champion of the Horde

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Bruiser that with his bear, Misha, expertly controls areas of the battleground.
description: It was a strange twist of fate that led the wandering half-ogre Rexxar to the fledgling city of Orgrimmar. With his aid, Thrall and the Horde were able to secure their homeland and defend it from the invading forces of Lord Admiral Daelin Proudmoore.

trait.name: Misha, Focus!
trait.description: Passive: Misha gains 15% move speed.   Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait.  Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar.  Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.
trait.displayText: Command Misha to move or attack

abilities.name: Spirit Swoop
abilities.description: Deal 141 damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Launch a hawk to damage enemies and slow them

abilities.name: Misha, Charge!
abilities.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 150 damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Order Misha to charge, damaging and stunning enemies

abilities.name: Mend Pet
abilities.description: Heal Misha for 714 Health over 5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Heal Misha over time

heroicAbilities.name: Unleash the Boars
heroicAbilities.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Send a pack of boars to hunt enemy Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Bestial Wrath
heroicAbilities.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Increases Misha's Basic Attacks

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Kharazim
title: Veradani Monk

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A flexible Healer that pairs well with Melee allies who like to dive into the enemy team.
description: To the monks of Ivgorod, the gods are in all things, and their divine will is proclaimed by the Patriarchs. With unshakable faith, Kharazim carries forth the decrees of the thousand and one gods to the ends of Sanctuary and the realms beyond.

trait.name: Pick Your Trait
trait.description: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.
trait.displayText: Choose a Trait

abilities.name: Radiant Dash
abilities.description: Jump to an allied or enemy unit. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack.  Stores up to 2 charges.
abilities.displayText: Jump to an ally or enemy

abilities.name: Breath of Heaven
abilities.description: Heal nearby Heroes for 276 and give them 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Heal nearby ally Heroes and grant Movement Speed

abilities.name: Deadly Reach
abilities.description: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Increases Attack Speed and Attack Range

heroicAbilities.name: Seven-Sided Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Become Invulnerable and strike nearby Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Palm
heroicAbilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Prevent an ally from death

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Leoric
title: The Skeleton King

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Bruiser that deals high damage against teams with many high Health Heroes.
description: Madness. Betrayal. Death. These are the legacy of the Black King Leoric's reign. Driven to madness by the spirit of Diablo, Leoric brought untold suffering on his kingdom. Even after his death there was no release for the Skeleton King.

trait.name: Undying
trait.description: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.  Wrath Of The Bone King  Leoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.
trait.displayText: Leoric haunts his enemies as a ghost while dead

abilities.name: Skeletal Swing
abilities.description: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!
abilities.displayText: Damage and slow enemies

abilities.name: Drain Hope
abilities.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 3 seconds. Leoric's Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while this is active.
abilities.displayText: Drain Health from an enemy Hero while close to them

abilities.name: Wraith Walk
abilities.description: Leoric separates from his body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, his body jumps to his wraith.
abilities.displayText: Leoric's ghost separates from his body to move unhindered

heroicAbilities.name: Entomb
heroicAbilities.description: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Wall in an area

heroicAbilities.name: March of the Black King
heroicAbilities.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.
heroicAbilities.displayText: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: The Butcher
title: Flesh Carver

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: An Assassin who starts slow, but deals extreme damage after collecting enough Meat.
description: An unrelenting hacking echoed off the walls of the Cathedral and as Prince Aidan made his way through its depths, the sound only grew louder. There were no screams; just that dreadful sound... over and over.

trait.name: Fresh Meat
trait.description: Upon dying, nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy Heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying.  Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat.  Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh Meat is no longer lost on death.
trait.displayText: Gather strength by killing enemies and collecting their meat

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.description: Deal 110 damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.  The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.
abilities.displayText: Deals damage in an area and slows enemies

abilities.name: Butcher's Brand
abilities.description: Deal 37 damage to an enemy and Brand them for 4 seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for 75% of the damage done.  Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by 0.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Brand an enemy, granting Life Steal against them

abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 119 damage.
abilities.displayText: Charges at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage

heroicAbilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
heroicAbilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Chain an enemy Hero to a post

heroicAbilities.name: Furnace Blast
heroicAbilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Deal damage around The Butcher after a delay

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Johanna
title: Crusader of Zakarum

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Tank who shines against Physical Attackers and can effectively clear groups of minions.
description: There have been many women who have borne the name Johanna in service of the crusade, and each has given her life to purify her faith. Johanna carries on their legacy as she searches the kingdom of Khanduras for the fallen star.

trait.name: Iron Skin
trait.description: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 674 damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.
trait.displayText: Becomes Unstoppable and gains a Shield

abilities.name: Punish
abilities.description: Step forward dealing 113 damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage and slow enemies

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.
abilities.displayText: Pulls and damages nearby enemies

abilities.name: Shield Glare
abilities.description: Deal 59 damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damages and blinds enemies in a cone

heroicAbilities.name: Falling Sword
heroicAbilities.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.   After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Jump to area, damaging and Slowing enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Blessed Shield
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 114 damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Throw a bouncing shield that Stuns

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Kael'thas
title: The Sun King

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A fire Mage that punishes enemies that stay close together.
description: Like all Blood Elves, Prince Kael'thas was transformed by the fall of Quel'Thalas. Desperate to save his people from being consumed by their magical addiction, he joined forces with the Burning Legion and now lords over Tempest Keep.

trait.name: Verdant Spheres
trait.description: Activate to make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful.
trait.displayText: Make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 345 damage in an area.   Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.
abilities.displayText: Deal damage in an area

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Deal 126 damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 damage to all nearby enemies.  Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.  Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.
abilities.displayText: Damage an enemy over time, eventually exploding in an area around them

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second.   Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.
abilities.displayText: Stun an enemy

heroicAbilities.name: Phoenix
heroicAbilities.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 damage and splashing for 39 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon a Phoenix to burn enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Pyroblast
heroicAbilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 damage to an enemy Hero and 405 damage to enemies nearby.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Blast an enemy with a big fireball

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Sylvanas
title: The Banshee Queen

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: An Assassin who can shut down enemy Forts and Keeps.
description: Sylvanas Windrunner was not always the Dark Lady of the Forsaken. In another life, she was the Ranger-General of Silvermoon. But that was before the Death Knight Arthas slew her and her people and raised her as the first Banshee.

trait.name: Black Arrows
trait.description: Activate to cause all Basic Attacks and Abilities to Stun Minions, non-Elite Mercenaries, and Structures for 3 seconds. Lasts for 10 seconds.    Banshee's Curse  Basic Attacks infect enemies with Banshee's Curse for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Deal 25% more damage to enemies with 3 stacks.
trait.displayText: Basic Attacks apply Banshee's Curse, activate to disable enemies

abilities.name: Withering Fire
abilities.description: Shoot the closest enemy up to 5 times over 1.5 seconds for 39 damage, prioritizing Heroes. Cooldown is reset on getting a Takedown.
abilities.displayText: Shoot arrows at the closest enemy. Cooldown is reset on Takedown.

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger
abilities.description: Throw a dagger at a target enemy that deals 30 damage and an additional 150 damage over 2.5 seconds. Damage dealt by Sylvanas to the initial target spreads Shadow Dagger to all nearby enemies.
abilities.displayText: Damage an enemy over time, spreading after hit

abilities.name: Haunting Wave
abilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.
abilities.displayText: Deals damage and allows teleportation

heroicAbilities.name: Wailing Arrow
heroicAbilities.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Fire arrow that damages and Silences

heroicAbilities.name: Mind Control
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Force an enemy Hero to walk towards Sylvanas

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: The Lost Vikings
title: Triple Trouble

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: Three Heroes in one! Can gather experience from multiple locations.
description: The Lost Vikings are back! While they briefly considered retirement after defeating the emperor Tomator, there were only so many polar bears they could wrestle before falling into a Nexus portal seemed like a solid life decision.

trait.name: Viking Hoard
trait.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.
trait.displayText: Gather Regen Globes to increase Health Regen

abilities.name: Select Olaf
abilities.description: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown.   Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Olaf has lots of health, regenerates health quickly, and charges to slow enemies

abilities.name: Select Baleog
abilities.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.
abilities.displayText: Baleog deals splash damage to enemies behind his attack target

abilities.name: Select Erik
abilities.description: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.
abilities.displayText: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has a longer attack range

abilities.name: Go Go Go!
abilities.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Gain 30% increased Movement Speed

heroicAbilities.name: Longboat Raid!
heroicAbilities.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 228 damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for 1 second. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Play Again!
heroicAbilities.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.   Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Revive and summon Vikings

expandedRole.name: Support
expandedRole.description: Support Make allies stronger and deadlier. Buff, augment, shield, and provide utility to the team.

name: Thrall
title: Warchief of the Horde

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A Bruiser who can hold his own in a lane of battle.
description: As a child, Thrall served the cruel Aedelas Blackmoore as a slave. After gaining his freedom, he guided the liberated orcs to a land of their own and worked to recover their ancient traditions. Now and forever he is the Warchief of the Horde.

trait.name: Frostwolf Resilience
trait.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for 223 Health.
trait.displayText: Casting Abilities on enemies grants charges that restore health

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 162 damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 81 damage to each enemy hit.
abilities.displayText: Shock enemies with bouncing lightning

abilities.name: Feral Spirit
abilities.description: Unleash a Feral Spirit that deals 153 damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.
abilities.displayText: Unleash a wolf spirit to burn enemies and Root Heroes

abilities.name: Windfury
abilities.description: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. His next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.
abilities.displayText: Increases Attack and Movement Speed

heroicAbilities.name: Sundering
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damages, pushes, and Stuns enemies in a line

heroicAbilities.name: Earthquake
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Slows enemies in a massive area

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Jaina
title: Archmage

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A frost Mage that can slow the entire enemy team.
description: Once the apprentice of the Archmage Antonidas, Jaina Proudmoore led the survivors of Lordaeron to Kalimdor and founded the city of Theramore. Now, she serves the Alliance as a powerful voice fighting for reason and diplomacy.

trait.name: Frostbite
trait.description: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, Slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her Abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Quest: Deal 15,000 Ability damage to Chilled Heroes.  Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block Ability, allowing Jaina to become temporarily Invulnerable.
trait.displayText: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, slowing them and causing them to take more damage

abilities.name: Frostbolt
abilities.description: Deal 184 damage and Chill the target.
abilities.displayText: Shoot a bolt that deals damage and Chills the target

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 142 damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.
abilities.displayText: Creates a storm of ice at target location, damaging and slowing enemies

abilities.name: Cone of Cold
abilities.description: Deal 220 damage and Chill targets.
abilities.displayText: Deal damage in a cone and Chill targets

heroicAbilities.name: Ring of Frost
heroicAbilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Create a ring that damages and Roots enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Summon Water Elemental
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon a Water Elemental that Chills enemies

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Azmodan
title: Lord of Sin

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A Summoner that can also deal high damage from far away.
description: The Lord of Sin rules over a densely populated land of Hell where both the greatest joys and despair, and the deepest depravities can be experienced. But it is never enough for Azmodan, who has set his eyes on the realm of Sanctuary.

trait.name: Demon Lieutenant
trait.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at any allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan Demon. The Lieutenant will cast Demonic Smite every 7 seconds, instantly killing an enemy Minion. Lasts 20 seconds.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.
trait.displayText: Azmodan summons a Demon Lieutenant to assist Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons

abilities.name: Globe of Annihilation
abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 184 damage on impact.  Quest: Hitting a Hero or killing a Minion within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation grants 2 Annihilation.  Reward: Each stack of Annihilation increases the damage of Globe of Annihilation by 1, up to 400.
abilities.displayText: Launch a long range orb of destruction dealing area damage

abilities.name: Summon Demon Warrior
abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches forward. Warriors deal 35 damage per Attack and 18 damage to nearby enemies every second. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.
abilities.displayText: Summon a Demon Warrior

abilities.name: All Shall Burn
abilities.description: Channel a beam of death on an enemy, dealing 128 damage per second for 2.5 seconds. If the Channel lasts its full duration, deal an extra 340 damage to the target.  Azmodan's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% while Channeling.
abilities.displayText: Channel a beam of death on an enemy

heroicAbilities.name: Demonic Invasion
heroicAbilities.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 damage, have 750 Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 97 damage to nearby enemies.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage area and create an army of Grunts

heroicAbilities.name: Tide of Sin
heroicAbilities.description: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Empower Globe of Annihilation

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Anub'arak
title: Traitor King

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Tank who specializes against Mages.
description: Once a proud nerubian king, Anub'arak dared to stand against the Lich King's invasion, but despite his bravery, he too fell to the unrelenting Scourge. Resurrected into undeath, the Traitor King now serves as a towering weapon of destruction.

trait.name: Scarab Host
trait.description: Using an Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 damage.
trait.displayText: Spawn a Beetle whenever an Ability is cast

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Deals 90 damage. Stuns for 1 second.
abilities.displayText: Shoot line of spikes that damages and stuns enemies

abilities.name: Harden Carapace
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that grants 40 Spell Armor and absorbs 340 damage over 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Gain a shield

abilities.name: Burrow Charge
abilities.description: Burrow to the target location, dealing 91 damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.  Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.
abilities.displayText: Burrow underground and charge in a direction

heroicAbilities.name: Locust Swarm
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 68 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 24 Health. Lasts 6 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damages enemies while healing

heroicAbilities.name: Cocoon
heroicAbilities.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Wraps enemy in a cocoon

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Chen
title: Legendary Brewmaster

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A potent Bruiser that wears downs enemies and is resistant to burst damage.
description: To be a brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew.

trait.name: Fortifying Brew
trait.description: Chen drinks from his keg, gaining 50 Brew and 180 temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 540 while drinking. Shields persist for 4 seconds after he stops drinking.
trait.displayText: Gain Brew and a Shield while drinking

abilities.name: Flying Kick
abilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 120 damage.
abilities.displayText: Kick through target enemy

abilities.name: Keg Smash
abilities.description: Deal 50 damage and soak enemies in Brew for 3 seconds, Slowing them by 10%. After 1.25 seconds, the Slow is increased to 40%.  After being used, this ability becomes Breath of Fire.  Breath of Fire Deal damage and Ignite Brew-soaked enemies.
abilities.displayText: Drench enemies in a nearby area with Brew, Slowing them

abilities.name: Stagger
abilities.description: Damage taken over the next 3 seconds is prevented.  Once this effect ends, Chen receives 75% of the damage taken over 5 seconds.  This damage cannot be modified.
abilities.displayText: Become immune to damage, then convert it to damage over time

heroicAbilities.name: Wandering Keg
heroicAbilities.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Roll around in the barrel and knock away enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Split into three elemental spirits

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Rehgar
title: Shaman of the Earthen Ring

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A well-rounded Healer that pairs well with Melee allies.
description: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the lands of Azeroth.

trait.name: Ghost Wolf
trait.description: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.
trait.displayText: Transform into a Ghost Wolf

abilities.name: Chain Heal
abilities.description: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for 260 Health. The wave then bounces 2 times to nearby allies within 7 range, restoring 260 Health to them.
abilities.displayText: Create a healing wave that jumps between allies

abilities.name: Lightning Shield
abilities.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 64 damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Imbue target ally with lightning, causing damage to nearby enemies

abilities.name: Earthbind Totem
abilities.description: Create a totem that Slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 Health and lasts for 8 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Creates a totem that Slows nearby enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Ancestral Healing
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 Health.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Significantly heal allied Hero

heroicAbilities.name: Bloodlust
heroicAbilities.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 40% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Give allied Heroes Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Life Steal

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Zagara
title: Broodmother of the Swarm

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A Summoner who provides lots of vision of the battleground.
description: If Kerrigan is the Queen of the Zerg, then Zagara is the mother of the brood. Cunning and tenacious, she commands her minions on the field of battle. Encounter her brood and beware: Mess with her children, and you answer to mama.

trait.name: Creep Tumor
trait.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains 20% additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move 20% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds and reveal the surrounding area while active.  Stores up to 3 charges.
trait.displayText: Generates Creep allowing Zagara and her minions to move faster

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage
abilities.description: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 damage to enemies it hits.  Stores up to 4 charges.
abilities.displayText: Launch a Baneling that explodes on contact with an enemy

abilities.name: Hunter Killer
abilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 71 damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Unleash a Hydralisk on an enemy

abilities.name: Infested Drop
abilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 140 damage.   The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 27 damage per second and last for 8 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Bombard an area with a Zerg Drop Pod that spawns Roachlings

heroicAbilities.name: Devouring Maw
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 94 damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Eats enemies in area

heroicAbilities.name: Nydus Network
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Empowers Creep and can create Nydus Worms

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Murky
title: Baby Murloc

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: Not quite a full Hero, Murky can place an Egg to respawn quickly back into battle.
description: Mrgglglbrlg rmrmgllg mrggggm. Mrrglglgy, mgllglgl mgggrrmgl? MRGGGLGLLM! Mrrggllgggllggll mrrglrlg mrrg mrrg mrrrg.

trait.name: Spawn Egg
trait.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. Murky only grants 25% of a real Hero's experience upon dying.  If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.
trait.displayText: Place an Egg, from which Murky will respawn

abilities.name: Slime
abilities.description: Deal 86 damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 6 seconds, slowing them by 20%.   Deal 210 damage to enemies who are already Slimed.
abilities.displayText: Release Slime to damage and slow enemies

abilities.name: Pufferfish
abilities.description: Spit out a Pufferfish with 225 health at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 410 damage. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.
abilities.displayText: Spit out a fish that explodes after a delay

abilities.name: Safety Bubble
abilities.description: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.
abilities.displayText: Becomes Invulnerable, but cannot attack or use abilities

heroicAbilities.name: March of the Murlocs
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Swarm enemies with Murlocs

heroicAbilities.name: Octo-Grab
heroicAbilities.description: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Stun and poke an enemy Hero

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Brightwing
title: Faerie Dragon

role.name: Support
