role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A Healer who can teleport to allies, excelling on large battlegrounds.
description: Like many faerie dragons, Brightwing is happiest darting around the forests of Ashenvale, healing friends, and then grabbing a light snack. By the way, did you know a human head only weighs ten pounds? Talk about light!

trait.name: Soothing Mist
trait.description: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.  Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 105 every 4 seconds
trait.displayText: Remove disabling effects from allies

abilities.name: Arcane Flare
abilities.description: Shoot a flare dealing 75 damage to enemies hit, and an additional 105 damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.
abilities.displayText: Fire a damaging flare

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.description: Polymorph a target for 1.5 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 30% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.
abilities.displayText: Disable an enemy

abilities.name: Pixie Dust
abilities.description: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 30 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 30%.
abilities.displayText: Increase a Hero's Movement Speed and grant Spell Armor

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: After 2 seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for 25% of their maximum Health.
abilities.displayText: Teleport to an allied Hero and heal them

heroicAbilities.name: Blink Heal
heroicAbilities.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200.  Stores up to 2 charges.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Teleport to allies and heal them

heroicAbilities.name: Emerald Wind
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 damage and pushing enemies away.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damages and pushes enemies in area

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Li Li
title: World Wanderer

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A sustained Healer who works well against Physical attackers by Blinding them.
description: Born upon Shen-zin Su, the Wandering Isle, Li Li Stormstout led an uneventful life until she began reading her uncle Chen's journals. Soon, nothing would sate her desire for adventure, exploration, and pestering adventurers around Halfhill.

trait.name: Fast Feet
trait.description: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 50% faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.
trait.displayText: When struck by enemies, gain Movement Speed

abilities.name: Healing Brew
abilities.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) within 6 range for 175 Health.
abilities.displayText: Heal a nearby ally

abilities.name: Cloud Serpent
abilities.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies every second. Each attack deals 26 damage and heals the ally for 20. Lasts for 8 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Summon a serpent to assist an ally

abilities.name: Blinding Wind
abilities.description: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 133 damage. Affected targets are Blinded for 1.5 seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.
abilities.displayText: Blind and damage nearby enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
heroicAbilities.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50 additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 Health.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Rapidly heal nearby allies

heroicAbilities.name: Water Dragon
heroicAbilities.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damages and heavily slows nearest enemy Hero

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Tychus
title: Notorious Outlaw

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: An Assassin who shreds High Health enemies.
description: Tychus Findlay is a big man with a big ego and a bigger gun. Fortunately, his loyalty is easily won. Buy him a drink or three and promise him enough credits, and there's no job in the whole universe too dangerous for this outlaw.

trait.name: Minigun
trait.description: Activate to have Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.
trait.displayText: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage to Heroes

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 552 damage to the target and 276 damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target.  Can move and use Abilities while Channeling.
abilities.displayText: Attack one target while moving, damaging nearby enemies as well

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 damage, knocking enemies away.
abilities.displayText: Throw a grenade, damaging and knocking back enemies

abilities.name: Run and Gun
abilities.description: Dash a short distance.
abilities.displayText: Dash a short distance

heroicAbilities.name: Commandeer Odin
heroicAbilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Call down an Odin to pilot

heroicAbilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
heroicAbilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Call down a Laser to attack nearby enemies

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Abathur
title: Evolution Master

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.
description: Abathur, the Evolution Master of Kerrigan's Swarm, works ceaselessly to improve the zerg from the genetic level up. His hate for chaos and imperfection almost rivals his hatred of pronouns.

trait.name: Locust Strain
trait.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 16 seconds, have 350 health and deal 46 damage with each Basic Attack, dealing 25% bonus damage to enemy Structures.
trait.displayText: Spawn locusts that attack down the nearest lane

abilities.name: Symbiote
abilities.description: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.
abilities.displayText: Assist an ally and gain new abilities

abilities.name: Toxic Nest
abilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.
abilities.displayText: Spawn a mine

abilities.name: Deep Tunnel
abilities.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location
abilities.displayText: Tunnel to a location.

heroicAbilities.name: Ultimate Evolution
heroicAbilities.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Clone target allied Hero and control it

heroicAbilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity
heroicAbilities.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity

expandedRole.name: Support
expandedRole.description: Support Make allies stronger and deadlier. Buff, augment, shield, and provide utility to the team.

name: Arthas
title: The Lich King

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Tank who is proficient against melee Physical Attackers, slowing them.
description: Once the crown prince of Lordaeron, and protégé of Uther the Lightbringer, Arthas was corrupted by the cursed blade Frostmourne in a bid to save his people. Now he rules over the damned as the Lich King and all shall know his wrath.

trait.name: Frostmourne Hungers
trait.description: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately and deal 99 increased damage. Dealing damage restores 30 Mana.
trait.displayText: Activate to empower the next attack and restore Mana on hit

abilities.name: Death Coil
abilities.description: Deals 164 damage to target enemy.  Can be self-cast to heal for 262 Health.
abilities.displayText: Deals damage to a target or heal Arthas

abilities.name: Howling Blast
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 damage.
abilities.displayText: Root and damage enemies in an area

abilities.name: Frozen Tempest
abilities.description: Deal 40 damage per second to nearby enemies and Slow their Movement Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Frozen Tempest's effects last for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage and slow nearby enemies. Drains Mana while active

heroicAbilities.name: Army of the Dead
heroicAbilities.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds and atttack for 20 damage. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 Health.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Raise ghouls that fight enemies, heal Arthas

heroicAbilities.name: Summon Sindragosa
heroicAbilities.description: Deals 230 damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Disables enemies and Structures

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Diablo
title: Lord of Terror

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A risky Tank who can devastate an enemy team with his "all-in" combo potential.
description: Known in the ancient tongue as Al'Diabolos, the Prime Evil of Terror, the Demon Lord Diablo seeks to claim the world of Sanctuary for the Burning Hells. His victims are innumerable, his schemes unknowable, and his gender... malleable.

trait.name: Black Soulstone
trait.description: Repeatable Quest: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.3% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.
trait.displayText: Gather souls from enemies to gain Health and resurrect faster

abilities.name: Shadow Charge
abilities.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 130 damage.
abilities.displayText: Charge to a target enemy and push them back

abilities.name: Fire Stomp
abilities.description: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal 12 damage each. Once they reach maximum range they return, dealing an additional 36 damage. Diablo heals for 130% of the damage dealt to Heroes.
abilities.displayText: Unleash fire waves in a direction

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 damage and Stunning for 0.25 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Grab an enemy and slam them behind Diablo, stunning them and dealing damage

heroicAbilities.name: Apocalypse
heroicAbilities.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Stun all enemy Heroes

heroicAbilities.name: Lightning Breath
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.   Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and Slow enemies in front of Diablo

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Illidan
title: The Betrayer

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A mobile, sustained damage Assassin who pairs well with Heroes that can enable him.
description: Illidan Stormrage, the first demon hunter, betrayed his people and created a new Well of Eternity after the demonic invasion of Azeroth. Now Illidan lords over Outland slaying unsuitably prepared Heroes who venture into his domain.

trait.name: Betrayer's Thirst
trait.description: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns by 1 second.
trait.displayText: Basic Attacks heal for part of the damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns

abilities.name: Dive
abilities.description: Dive at the target, dealing 66 damage and flipping to the other side of the target.
abilities.displayText: Dive and flip over an enemy

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases Illidan's Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Dash and damage enemies while gaining Basic Attack damage

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Evade enemy Basic Attacks

heroicAbilities.name: Metamorphosis
heroicAbilities.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage area and increase max Health

heroicAbilities.name: The Hunt
heroicAbilities.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Charge a target from a very long range

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Kerrigan
title: Queen of Blades

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A combo Assassin who goes all in, diving into the enemy team.
description: Once a terran ghost with formidable psionic abilities, Sarah Kerrigan was betrayed by her allies and transformed into the Queen of Blades. Now freed of the dark one's corruption, Kerrigan faces a threat that could destroy the galaxy itself.

trait.name: Assimilation
trait.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.  Current maximum: 1004
trait.displayText: Gain a temporary Shield by attacking enemies

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Leap to a target, dealing 130 damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, restore 1 charge and refund 20 Mana.
abilities.displayText: Leap to an enemy and deal damage

abilities.name: Impaling Blades
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 165 damage to enemies within the target area, Stunning them for 1 second.
abilities.displayText: Stun and damage enemies in an area

abilities.name: Primal Grasp
abilities.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 25 damage. After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing 195 damage to nearby enemies.
abilities.displayText: Pull and damage enemies in an area

heroicAbilities.name: Maelstrom
heroicAbilities.description: Deals 74 damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Persistently damage nearby enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Summon Ultralisk
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon a commandable Ultralisk

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Malfurion
title: Archdruid

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A strong sustained Healer who can help lockdown enemies to secure takedowns.
description: Malfurion Stormrage is the greatest druid on Azeroth, and a student of the demi-god Cenarius. Communing with nature and Cenarius through the Emerald dream, Malfurion protects the wilds from demonic influences.

trait.name: Innervate
trait.description: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Cannot be used on Heroes that do not use Mana.
trait.displayText: Grant Mana to an ally and reduce their cooldowns

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal an allied Hero for 380 Health over 20 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Heal an allied Hero over time

abilities.name: Moonfire
abilities.description: Deal 90 damage to enemies in an area and reveal them for 2 seconds.  Allies with an active Regrowth are healed for 130 Health for each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in an area, and heal allies with Regrowth

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Root enemy Heroes in an area for 1.25 seconds, and deal 117 damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Root and damage Heroes in an area

heroicAbilities.name: Tranquility
heroicAbilities.description: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Continually heal nearby allies

heroicAbilities.name: Twilight Dream
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Silence and damage nearby enemies

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Muradin
title: Mountain King

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A sturdy Tank that can do well in a multitude of situations.
description: Once a mentor to Prince Arthas, Muradin was unable to prevent his corruption. After recovering from a mild case of amnesia, he is now the leader of the Bronzebeard clan after the "diamond-ization" of his brother King Magni.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.description: Muradin restores 55 Health per second when he has not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 111 Health per second.
trait.displayText: Restore Health when not taking damage

abilities.name: Storm Bolt
abilities.description: Throw a hammer, dealing 110 damage to the first enemy hit and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  Quest: Hit 25 Heroes with Storm Bolt. Heroes who die within 2.5 seconds of being hit by Storm Bolt count as hitting 3 additional Heroes.  Reward: Storm Bolt pierces to hit an additional target, and Muradin's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt by 1 second.
abilities.displayText: Throw a hammer, stunning and damaging the first enemy hit

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Blast nearby enemies for 96 damage and Slow them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed reduced by 25% for the duration.
abilities.displayText: Slow and damage nearby enemies

abilities.name: Dwarf Toss
abilities.description: Leap to target location, dealing 59 damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain 30 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 30%.
abilities.displayText: Leap to an area, dealing damage to nearby enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Avatar
heroicAbilities.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 Health.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Temporary Health boost

heroicAbilities.name: Haymaker
heroicAbilities.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 damage and knocking them aside.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Stun and knock an enemy away

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Nazeebo
title: Heretic Witch Doctor

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A sustained damage Mage who gains power when killing enemy minions.
description: With cabalistic incantations and vestments of feather and bone, the witch doctor Nazeebo calls upon spirits from the Unformed Land to aid him. Few outlanders encounter a witch doctor in the flesh, without losing their own.

trait.name: Voodoo Ritual
trait.description: Nazeebo's Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 67 additional damage over 6 seconds.   Quest: If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, Nazeebo permanently gains 6 Health and 1 Mana.
trait.displayText: Basic Attacks and Abilities deal damage over time. Killed minions increase Health and Mana.

abilities.name: Corpse Spiders
abilities.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 38 damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Throw a jar that summons Spiders to attack enemies hit

abilities.name: Zombie Wall
abilities.description: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 28 damage and last for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Summon a temporary ring of zombies that trap and attack

abilities.name: Plague of Toads
abilities.description: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 119 damage over 6 seconds. This effect stacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.
abilities.displayText: Summon a wave of exploding toads

heroicAbilities.name: Gargantuan
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 damage when summoned, attacks for 140 damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area

heroicAbilities.name: Ravenous Spirit
heroicAbilities.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 230 damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Channel a damaging, movable spirit

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Nova
title: Dominion Ghost

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A burst damage Mage who can ambush enemies from Stealth.
description: November "Nova" Terra is a ghost of the Terran Dominion and one of the most powerful psionic soldiers ever known. Nova is highly focused, determined, and extremely deadly. Even Jim Raynor wouldn't want to be caught in her crosshairs.

trait.name: Permanent Cloak
trait.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Passive: Gain 15% Movement Speed while Stealthed.
trait.displayText: Stealth and gain Move Speed while not attacking or taking damage

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: Deal 230 damage to the first enemy hit.  Passive: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 6%, stacking up to 30%. Gain an additional 25% damage bonus at maximum stacks. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.
abilities.displayText: Fire a shot and deal a large amount of damage to the first enemy hit

abilities.name: Pinning Shot
abilities.description: Deal 100 damage to an enemy and Slow them by 40% for 2.25 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Slow and damage an enemy

abilities.name: Holo Decoy
abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds with 100% of Nova's current Health that attacks enemies, dealing 10% of Nova's base damage. Whenever a Decoy takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
abilities.displayText: Create a hologram decoy of Nova

abilities.name: Ghost Protocol
abilities.description: Activate to instantly grant Stealth to Nova and spawn a Holo Decoy at her location. Nova is Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds when Stealthed by Ghost Protocol.
abilities.displayText: Instantly Stealth and spawn a Holo Decoy at your location

heroicAbilities.name: Triple Tap
heroicAbilities.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 damage each.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Fire at a target 3 times

heroicAbilities.name: Precision Strike
heroicAbilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Area attack with unlimited range

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Raynor
title: Renegade Commander

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A Physical Damage Assassin that can keep enemies away.
description: Ex-Confederate Marshal James Raynor has stood against whatever the universe can throw at him and survived. He stands as a beacon of hope among enigmatic aliens and monsters, fighting for justice in a cold uncaring universe.

trait.name: Give 'Em Some Pepper
trait.description: Every 4th Basic Attack splashes in a small area and deals 125% more damage to the main target.
trait.displayText: Periodically empower Basic Attacks

abilities.name: Penetrating Round
abilities.description: Deal 220 damage, knock back, and Slow enemies in a line by 20% for 2 seconds. Enemies close to Raynor are knocked back further.
abilities.displayText: Fire a shot damaging, knocking back, and Slowing enemies

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Raynor and all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries gain 30% Attack Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Casting Inspire resets Raynor's Basic Attack cooldown.
abilities.displayText: Reset and empower Basic Attacks

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Heal Raynor for 25% of his maximum Health over 1 second. Raynor's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of this by 0.5 seconds, doubled against Heroes.
abilities.displayText: Activate to heal

heroicAbilities.name: Hyperion
heroicAbilities.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Call down a strafing Battlecruiser

heroicAbilities.name: Raynor's Raider
heroicAbilities.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 damage per second and regenerates 75 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Summon a Banshee escort

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Sgt. Hammer
title: Siege Tank Operator

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A long-range, Physical Damage dealer that needs protection from allies.
description: Sergeant Bama "the Hammer" Kowalski has served some of the toughest tours around the Koprulu sector. The roar of her siege tank's shock cannon strikes fear right into the heart of the toughest of warriors... including some of her allies.

trait.name: Siege Mode
trait.description: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.
trait.displayText: Become immobile to increase range and empower Basic Attacks

abilities.name: Spider Mines
abilities.description: Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.  Siege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.
abilities.displayText: Create mines that slow and damage enemies on contact

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Deal 141 damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back.  Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.
abilities.displayText: Knock back and damage enemies

abilities.name: Neosteel Plating
abilities.description: Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.
abilities.displayText: Gain temporary Armor

abilities.name: Thrusters
abilities.description: Increase Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Hall of Storms. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.
abilities.displayText: Activate to gain a burst of Movement Speed

heroicAbilities.name: Blunt Force Gun
heroicAbilities.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Fire a large bullet across the map

heroicAbilities.name: Napalm Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Fire damaging napalm at enemies

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Sonya
title: Wandering Barbarian

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Bruiser that's great at capturing Mercenary camps and likes to dive into the enemy team.
description: From the frozen Dreadlands of the north come the mighty Barbarian warriors. After surviving the destruction of her home and death of her tribe, Sonya wanders Sanctuary in search of battle and a better life for her people.

trait.name: Fury
trait.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
trait.displayText: Generate Fury in combat. All Abilities grant Move Speed

abilities.name: Ancient Spear
abilities.description: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.
abilities.displayText: Throw a spear and pull self to the first enemy hit, stunning and dealing damage

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Deals 176 damage to the target enemy, and 44 to enemies behind the target.
abilities.displayText: Damage an enemy and splash damage behind them

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Deals 138 damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, healing for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.
abilities.displayText: Damage nearby enemies and heal for a percentage of damage dealt

heroicAbilities.name: Leap
heroicAbilities.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Jump to a location, deal damage, and stun enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker
heroicAbilities.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Increase damage and reduce disable duration

expandedRole.name: Bruiser
expandedRole.description: Bruiser Strong and sturdy warriors that also dish out pain. Not suitable for solo tanking, instead, they have additional mobility, crowd control, or survival capabilities.

name: Tyrael
title: Archangel of Justice

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Tank who pairs well with allies that like to dive into the enemy team.
description: Among the angels it is the Archangel of Justice Tyrael who is humanity's greatest defender. Wielding his sword El'druin against the Burning Hells, the Prime Evils would have enslaved humanity long ago if Tyrael had not intervened.

trait.name: Archangel's Wrath
trait.description: Upon dying, become Invulnerable and explode for 550 damage after 3.5 seconds. Each enemy Hero hit by this effect reduces Tyrael's death timer by 10%.
trait.displayText: Upon dying, become invulnerable and explode

abilities.name: El'druin's Might
abilities.description: Throw El'druin to the target area, dealing 110 damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. It can be reactivated within 5 seconds to teleport Tyrael to El'druin and Slow nearby enemies again.
abilities.displayText: Slow and damage enemies in an area. Use ability again to teleport to the area

abilities.name: Righteousness
abilities.description: Shields Tyrael for 336 damage and nearby allied Heroes and Minions for 40% as much for 4 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Gain a temporary Shield

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Rake target area for 150 damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage an area and speed up nearby allies

heroicAbilities.name: Judgment
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Charge and Stun an enemy Hero

heroicAbilities.name: Sanctification
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Create zone of Invulnerable

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Tyrande
title: High Priestess of Elune

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A Healer who helps her allies lockdown and finish off enemies.
description: Tyrande Whisperwind strikes fear into all who wish ill of the Kaldorei. As the highest ranking Sentinel and High Priestess of Elune, she is not only the night elves' most deadly warrior, but also their most cunning leader.

trait.name: Hunter's Mark
trait.description: Reveal a non-Structure enemy and reduce their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.
trait.displayText: Lowers Armor and Reveals Marked target

abilities.name: Light of Elune
abilities.description: Heal an ally Hero for 255. Light of Elune's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds every time Tyrande hits an enemy with a Basic Attack or damages an enemy Hero.  Stores up to 2 charges. Cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.
abilities.displayText: Heal an allied Hero

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.description: Send an Owl across the battleground revealing its path, dealing 120 damage to the first Hero hit, and revealing them for 5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Fire a scouting Owl that reveals and damages enemy Heroes

abilities.name: Lunar Flare
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 150 damage and Stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Stun and damage enemies in an area

heroicAbilities.name: Shadowstalk
heroicAbilities.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Heal and Stealth all allies

heroicAbilities.name: Starfall
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 92 damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and Slow enemies in an area

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Uther
title: The Lightbringer

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Support heroes provide boosts and other benefits to their teammates.

shortDescription: A Healer that can negate high bursts of damage.
description: The first paladin and founder of the Order of the Silver Hand, Uther the Lightbringer is a faithful servant of the Light. Dispensing justice with the swing of his hammer, Uther is a bastion of truth and an unflinching symbol of the Alliance.

trait.name: Devotion, Eternal Vanguard
trait.description: Allied Heroes affected by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.  Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.
trait.displayText: Uther's healing grants Armor, and when killed his spirit remains

abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal target allied Hero for 362 Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 Health.
abilities.displayText: Heal an allied Hero and Uther

abilities.name: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allied Heroes and Minions in a line for 177 Health, dealing 177 damage to enemies.
abilities.displayText: Heal allies and damage enemies in a line

abilities.name: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 109 damage and Stun the target for 1 second.
abilities.displayText: Stun and damage an enemy

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Shield
heroicAbilities.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Give ally Invulnerable and increased Move Speed

heroicAbilities.name: Divine Storm
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 170 damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and stun nearby enemies

expandedRole.name: Healer
expandedRole.description: Healer Everyone's best friends. There to keep their allies alive and relatively healthy during teamfights.

name: Valla
title: Demon Hunter

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A well-rounded Assassin that's mobile and can deal high sustained damage.
description: Valla witnessed the ferocity of hellspawn firsthand as the demons ravaged her village and left her for dead. Now, with no people to call her own, her only allegiance is to her cause: to rid Sanctuary of the demonic filth corrupting its lands.

trait.name: Hatred
trait.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.
trait.displayText: Basic Attacks grant bonus Attack Damage and Move Speed temporarily

abilities.name: Hungering Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 140 damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies, prioritizing Heroes, dealing 80 damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.
abilities.displayText: Fire an arrow which seeks out and strikes multiple targets

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 172 damage to enemies within the target area.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in an area

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.
abilities.displayText: Dash to a location

heroicAbilities.name: Strafe
heroicAbilities.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Unleashes a flurry of arrows at enemies

heroicAbilities.name: Rain of Vengeance
heroicAbilities.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Area attack that stuns enemies

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Zeratul
title: Dark Prelate

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin who can dart around his enemies.
description: The enigmatic dark templar Zeratul serves the xel'naga. While he expertly wields the power of the Void, it is his wisdom that earns him the respect of the Koprulu sector's leaders - despite his penchant for dramatic entrances.

trait.name: Permanent Cloak
trait.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
trait.displayText: Become Stealthed while not attacking, using Abilities, or taking damage

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Deal 200 damage to nearby enemies.
abilities.displayText: Damage nearby enemies

abilities.name: Singularity Spike
abilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 240 damage after 1 second and Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Slow and damage the first enemy hit

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
abilities.displayText: Teleport to a location. Ability does not break cloak

abilities.name: Vorpal Blade
abilities.description: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Teleport to last attacked enemy

heroicAbilities.name: Might Of The Nerazim
heroicAbilities.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Recast last Basic Ability

heroicAbilities.name: Void Prison
heroicAbilities.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Time Stop targets in an area

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: E.T.C.
title: Rock God

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Tank who supplies his team with a good bit of utility.
description: The Power of the Horde incarnated by brutal rhythms and blistering guitar riffs into the most elite tauren chieftain to ever headbang across the surface of Azeroth. Don't bother putting on socks. He's just going to rock them off anyways.

trait.name: Rockstar
trait.description: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.
trait.displayText: After using an ability, E.T.C. gains Armor

abilities.name: Powerslide
abilities.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.
abilities.displayText: Dash to an area, stunning and damaging enemies hit

abilities.name: Face Melt
abilities.description: Deals 68 damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.
abilities.displayText: Knock back and damage nearby enemies

abilities.name: Guitar Solo
abilities.description: Regenerate 66 Health per second for 4 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Regenerate Health

heroicAbilities.name: Mosh Pit
heroicAbilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Nearby enemies must dance

heroicAbilities.name: Stage Dive
heroicAbilities.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Dive to a location and deal damage

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Falstad
title: Wildhammer Thane

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: An Assassin that can fly large distances, excelling on large battlegrounds.
description: Falstad is the High Thane of the Wildhammer Clan and a founding member of the Council of Three Hammers that presides over Ironforge. Despite speculation, Falstad has never been dead and anyone who claims such is a liar.

trait.name: Tailwind
trait.description: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.
trait.displayText: After not taking damage for a brief period, gain increased Movement Speed

abilities.name: Hammerang
abilities.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to Falstad, dealing 121 damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Throw out a Hammer that returns. Hammer slows and damages enemies

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Deal 107 damage to an enemy, and an additional 75 damage per second for 4 seconds while close to the target.
abilities.displayText: Deal damage to target enemy while staying close to them

abilities.name: Barrel Roll
abilities.description: Dashes forward and grants a 171 point Shield for 3 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Dash to a location and gain a temporary shield

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain.
abilities.displayText: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain

heroicAbilities.name: Hinterland Blast
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, deal 475 damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Long range damage beam

heroicAbilities.name: Mighty Gust
heroicAbilities.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Push away enemies and slow them

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.

name: Gazlowe
title: Boss of Ratchet

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

shortDescription: A Summoner that specializes in controlling key areas of the battleground.
description: Few would consider Gazlowe a fighter, but what he lacks in height, he makes up in mechanical know-how. Besides, you don't get to be boss of a "boom"-town like Ratchet with just a charming personality, if you know what I mean.

trait.name: Salvager
trait.description: Destroyed enemy Structures and Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores 30 Mana and causes Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3 seconds.   Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.
trait.displayText: Turrets and enemy Structures drop Scrap that restore Mana and reduce cooldowns

abilities.name: Rock-It! Turret
abilities.description: Creates a turret that deals 62 damage. Lasts for 30 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.
abilities.displayText: Create a turret that shoots at nearby enemies

abilities.name: Deth Lazor
abilities.description: Charged attack that deals 137 damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds.  Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.
abilities.displayText: Charge and shoot a laser. Damage and range increases the longer it is charged

abilities.name: Xplodium Charge
abilities.description: Places a bomb that deals 233 damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Throw a timed bomb which stuns and damages enemies in an area

abilities.name: Focus Turrets!
abilities.description: Orders any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus the target.
abilities.displayText: Order turrets to attack a target.

heroicAbilities.name: Robo-Goblin
heroicAbilities.description: Activate to gain 40 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.   Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Increase Attack Damage, Armor, Move Speed

heroicAbilities.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
heroicAbilities.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 damage.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Pulls and damages enemies

expandedRole.name: Melee Assassin
expandedRole.description: Melee Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain. Specialize in high damage output on single targets, or ambushes.

name: Stitches
title: Terror of Darkshire

role.name: Warrior
role.description: Warrior Front-line defenders and bruisers.

shortDescription: A Tank who wants to isolate distant enemies away from their team.
description: Take care when traversing the shadowed trails of Duskwood... Ever since Abercrombie the Embalmer unleashed his vile abomination upon Darkshire, Stitches has wandered the road aimlessly, hungering for the flesh of low level Alliance players.

trait.name: Vile Cleaver
trait.description: Basic Attacks splash Vile Gas, poisoning nearby enemies for 45 damage over 3 seconds. Re-applying Vile Gas increases its current duration to a maximum of 10 seconds.
trait.displayText: Basic Attacks splash additional damage over time

abilities.name: Hook
abilities.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 damage.
abilities.displayText: Pull the first target hit towards Stitches

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Deal 104 damage to enemies within the target area. Enemies in the inner impact area take 40% more damage and are Slowed by 45% for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage and Slow enemies in an area

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Deal 319 damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches's maximum Health.
abilities.displayText: Damage an enemy and restore Health

abilities.name: Helping Hand
abilities.description: Activate to use Hook that can hit allied Heroes. When used to pull allies, the cooldown of Hook is reduced by 50%.
abilities.displayText: Pull the first target hit towards Stitches

heroicAbilities.name: Putrid Bile
heroicAbilities.description: Emit bile that deals 37 damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Emit a Slowing bile trail

heroicAbilities.name: Gorge
heroicAbilities.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Completely consume an enemy Hero

expandedRole.name: Tank
expandedRole.description: Tank Front-line defenders, capable of withstanding some serious damage. In charge of shielding their more fragile teammates from enemies.

name: Tassadar
title: Savior of the Templar

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

shortDescription: A psychic Mage that can deliver area damage from long distances.
description: An Executor without equal, Tassadar has fought tirelessly to purify the Koprulu sector of zerg infestation. Only now, after learning to wield the power of the void, is Tassadar finally ready to face the Overmind and its all-consuming Swarm.

trait.name: Resonance Beam
trait.description: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Channeled beam that Slows by 15%. While Channeling, your Basic Attack damage and Mana regeneration increases by 25% a second, to a maximum of 100%. While at full charge, gain an extra 3 Mana every second.  This bonus is lost after 6 seconds of not Channeling.
trait.displayText: Basic Attacks are Channeled, restore Mana

abilities.name: Shock Ray
abilities.description: Channel a beam of Psionic energy, dealing 280 damage and Slowing enemies in a line by 30% for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Damage and Slow enemies in a line

abilities.name: Psionic Storm
abilities.description: Create a Psionic Storm at the targeted location for 3 seconds. While in a storm, enemies take 38 damage every 0.5 seconds, increasing by 20% for each consecutive instance of damage, up to 100%.
abilities.displayText: Damage enemies in an area

abilities.name: Force Wall
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second delay, create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.
abilities.displayText: Create an unpathable wall

heroicAbilities.name: Archon
heroicAbilities.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to 40% of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Lasts for 12 seconds.  Resonance Beam: Deals 150 damage to the target and splashes 75 damage to nearby enemies. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by 20 for 2 seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Become an Archon

heroicAbilities.name: Black Hole
heroicAbilities.description: After a 0.5 second cast, create a Black Hole that travels in a long line. Enemy Heroes within the Black Hole's area are quickly pulled towards its center. Touching the center deals 310 damage and Stuns the target for 1.25 seconds.
heroicAbilities.displayText: Damage and Stun Heroes in long line

expandedRole.name: Ranged Assassin
expandedRole.description: Ranged Assassin Damage dealers who rain bullets, arrows, or deadly spells down upon on enemies' heads. Generally fragile, they feel safest keeping their distance away from enemies.
